STATEMENT
We cannot and will not ship goods to the following Countries - Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Libya, North Korea, Sudan, UNITA (Angola), Afghanistan, Belarus, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Burma, Haiti, Indonesia, Kosovo, Liberia, Macedonia, Nigeria, Rwanda, Slovenia, Somalia, Syria, Yemen, Democratic Republic of the Congo (formerly Zaire), Zimbabwe.
POLICY
This equipment is offered with our as-represented guarantee. For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).
DISCLAIMER
Regardless of the origin of the equipment, documentation provided or identification appearing upon the equipment, the equipment described and offered here is in no way certified for, recommended for, or offered for any specific use. The purchaser agrees that the seller shall not be held responsible or liable for any injuries or damages, whether incidental or consequential, associated in any way with the equipment. The purchaser, by bidding on this equipment, indicates their acknowledgment of, and agreement to the terms of this disclaimer.
EBAY RULES
"The sale of this item may be subject to regulation by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and state and local regulatory agencies. If so, do not bid on this item unless you are an authorized purchaser. If the item is subject to FDA regulation, I will verify your status as an authorized purchaser of this item before shipping of the item." If you have questions about legal obligations regarding sales of medical devices, you should consult with the FDA's Center for Devices and Radiological Health:
tools4docs
http://www.fda.gov/cdrh/devadvice/
http://www.fda.gov/cdrh/industry/support/
Phone number: 800.638.2041
This equipment has been properly Cleaned and or Sterilized (where required). Furthermore, this equipment does Not require a prescription from a doctor, dentist, optometrist, or veterinarian. Unless otherwise stated, all goods sold have been either opened or have been previously used.
Tools4Docs is an Exporters and Re-Seller of Medical Equipment located in Tampa, Florida and can be reached by calling (813) 699-4048.
Shipping :
All goods are shipped as soon as payment is received utilizing UPS, FedEx, USPS or DHL and is strictly to our discretion unless other prior arrangement have been made and agreed upon by and between the buyer and us (The seller).
A tracking number will be emailed to you as soon as it is available.
If shipping address is unconfirmed by PayPal, you will need to pay for insurance.
International Customers, please be advised that you are Responsible for:
a) Determining if these types of goods are allowed to be imported into your country and if required, that you have all necessary permits, Etc
b) Paying for Customs duties, taxes, Etc.
Payment :
Please DON'T take your time paying for your goods because it only delays the packing and shipping process.
We accept All forms of PayPal payments from customers with CONFIRMED shipping addresses ONLY ! otherwise, you will need to arrange for alternative method of payment with us for which you will receive a discount on top of the final purchase price. These alternative payment methods are secure as demonstrated by our
Feedback
however, if
Feedback
is not enough and you have your own requirements that you would like us to fulfill, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate you.

Payment
Payment Options:
We accept the below payment options. Please feel free to contact us with any questions regarding payments. You can reach us via email using "ask a question" in the eBay listing or by phone at 720-330-9307. Thank You!
1.
Paypal: We accept Paypal payment for items up to and including $2000. Any items selling for greater than $2000 will require an alternative payment method.
2.
Direct Credit Card payment to us over the phone. We accept Visa, Master Card, Discover, and American Express. Please call us at 720-330-9307 if you would like to pay for an item with a credit card. Credit cards are excepted for items in the amount of $2,000 or less.
3.
Business check or direct wire. We are happy to accept checks and wires, if you would like to pay with check or wire please email or call us and we will provide mailing address or wire information. Office: 720-330-9307
Ebay Seller ID: medicalequipmentesi
Company Name: Equipment Sales International LLC
Location: Denver, Colorado
Phone: 720-330-9307
Shipping
Shipping Information:
We pride ourselves in quality packaging to protect your item and fast shipping. In most cases your item will ship within 1 business day of payment receipt. We will send shipping notifications and tracking numbers as soon as item ships. Please see top of listing to determine what shipping method we will use for a particular item. We ship with USPS, UPS, and freight for larger items. Please feel free to contact us with any questions regarding shipping using "ask a question" in the eBay listing or by phone: 720-330-9307.
International Shipping: We have lots of experience with international shipping and can ship most items worldwide. If the international shipping price is not listed in the eBay listing, please contact us for a quote or with any questions.
Terms of Sale
Return Policy:
Most items we sell come with a 30 day money back guarantee. Please review the eBay listing to determine the guarantee that we are providing for the item. Some items have a longer guarantee, some have a shorter guarantee, and some items are sold as is. Please review the eBay listing of the item you are interested in to determine guarantee. Contact us with any questions. Thank You!
Ebay required FDA Statement:
The below statement is required by eBay when listing in medical categories. For most items we sell there are no restrictions to purchase but please contact us if you are unsure.
"The sale of this item may be subject to regulation by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and state and local regulatory agencies. If so, do not bid on this item unless you are an authorized purchaser. If the item is subject to FDA regulation, I will verify your status as an authorized purchaser of this item before shipping of the item."

For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).

Regardless of the origin of the equipment, documentation provided or identification appearing upon the equipment, the equipment described and offered here is in no way certified for, recommended for, or offered for any specific use. The purchaser agrees that the seller shall not be held responsible or liable for any injuries or damages, whether incidental or consequential, associated in any way with the equipment. The purchaser, by bidding on this equipment, indicates their acknowledgment of, and agreement to the terms of this disclaimer.

POLICY
This equipment is offered with our as-represented guarantee. For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).

For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).
DISCLAIMER
Regardless of the origin of the equipment, documentation provided or identification appearing upon the equipment, the equipment described and offered here is in no way certified for, recommended for, or offered for any specific use. The purchaser agrees that the seller shall not be held responsible or liable for any injuries or damages, whether incidental or consequential, associated in any way with the equipment. The purchaser, by bidding on this equipment, indicates their acknowledgment of, and agreement to the terms of this disclaimer.
EBAY RULES
"The sale of this item may be subject to regulation by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and state and local regulatory agencies. If so, do not bid on this item unless you are an authorized purchaser. If the item is subject to FDA regulation, I will verify your status as an authorized purchaser of this item before shipping of the item." If you have questions about legal obligations regarding sales of medical devices, you should consult with the FDA's Center for Devices and Radiological Health:
tools4docs
http://www.fda.gov/cdrh/devadvice/
http://www.fda.gov/cdrh/industry/support/
Phone number: 800.638.2041
This equipment has been properly Cleaned and or Sterilized (where required). Furthermore, this equipment does Not require a prescription from a doctor, dentist, optometrist, or veterinarian. Unless otherwise stated, all goods sold have been either opened or have been previously used.
Tools4Docs is an Exporters and Re-Seller of Medical Equipment located in Tampa, Florida and can be reached by calling (813) 699-4048.
Shipping :
All goods are shipped as soon as payment is received utilizing UPS, FedEx, USPS or DHL and is strictly to our discretion unless other prior arrangement have been made and agreed upon by and between the buyer and us (The seller).
A tracking number will be emailed to you as soon as it is available.
If shipping address is unconfirmed by PayPal, you will need to pay for insurance.
International Customers, please be advised that you are Responsible for:
a) Determining if these types of goods are allowed to be imported into your country and if required, that you have all necessary permits, Etc
b) Paying for Customs duties, taxes, Etc.
Payment :
Please DON'T take your time paying for your goods because it only delays the packing and shipping process.
We accept All forms of PayPal payments from customers with CONFIRMED shipping addresses ONLY ! otherwise, you will need to arrange for alternative method of payment with us for which you will receive a discount on top of the final purchase price. These alternative payment methods are secure as demonstrated by our
Feedback
however, if
Feedback
is not enough and you have your own requirements that you would like us to fulfill, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate you.

STATEMENT
We cannot and will not ship goods to the following Countries - Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Libya, North Korea, Sudan, UNITA (Angola), Afghanistan, Belarus, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Burma, Haiti, Indonesia, Kosovo, Liberia, Macedonia, Nigeria, Rwanda, Slovenia, Somalia, Syria, Yemen, Democratic Republic of the Congo (formerly Zaire), Zimbabwe.
POLICY
This equipment is offered with our as-represented guarantee. For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).
DISCLAIMER
Regardless of the origin of the equipment, documentation provided or identification appearing upon the equipment, the equipment described and offered here is in no way certified for, recommended for, or offered for any specific use. The purchaser agrees that the seller shall not be held responsible or liable for any injuries or damages, whether incidental or consequential, associated in any way with the equipment. The purchaser, by bidding on this equipment, indicates their acknowledgment of, and agreement to the terms of this disclaimer.
EBAY RULES
"The sale of this item may be subject to regulation by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and state and local regulatory agencies. If so, do not bid on this item unless you are an authorized purchaser. If the item is subject to FDA regulation, I will verify your status as an authorized purchaser of this item before shipping of the item." tools4docs

Phone number: 800.638.2041
This equipment has been properly Cleaned and or Sterilized (where required). Furthermore, this equipment does Not require a prescription from a doctor, dentist, optometrist, or veterinarian. Unless otherwise stated, all goods sold have been either opened or have been previously used.
Tools4Docs is an Exporters and Re-Seller of Medical Equipment located in Tampa, Florida and can be reached by calling (813) 699-4048.
Shipping :
All goods are shipped as soon as payment is received utilizing UPS, FedEx, USPS or DHL and is strictly to our discretion unless other prior arrangement have been made and agreed upon by and between the buyer and us (The seller).
A tracking number will be emailed to you as soon as it is available.
If shipping address is unconfirmed by PayPal, you will need to pay for insurance.
International Customers, please be advised that you are Responsible for:
a) Determining if these types of goods are allowed to be imported into your country and if required, that you have all necessary permits, Etc
b) Paying for Customs duties, taxes, Etc.
Payment :

Refunds
Refunds will be issued within 14 business days after the receipt of the equipment.All returned items must be in original condition, packaging, sealed and unused, tamper tag must be intact. We reserve the right to reject the item after inspection, (items with physical damage or incomplete packaging, incomplete items).In the event that physical damage is caused during transit of a return, it is the customers responsibility to contact the carrier to start a damage claim upon receiving a notification from us.The responsibility is between the customer and the carrier.
Items being sold as "For Parts Only" are sold as final sale. No returns will be accepted.
S
hipping Terms
Items ship within 1-2 business days after payment is received.Items will not ship on Saturday and Sunday.Orders will be shipped by the most cost effective channel.All items are packaged and shipped in a professional manner.The tracking number will be sent to you.Combined shipping discounts are available for multiple item purchases.
Flat rate fees are for Continental US shipping ONLY.Alaska, Hawaii and all other NON Contiguous Territories are extra cost.

DESCRIPTION
The item you are bidding on is:Ethicon Endo surgery ST Holster with cords

items are sold as
is, where is with no warranty expressed or implied.

PAYMENT
Payment accepted through PayPal, credit card & wire
transfer. Payment
MUST
be made 48 hours after the listing ends. If you have a problem with
this, contact us
BEFORE
bidding. If payment has not been received or no contact has been made,
we reserve the right to re-list the item and the purchaser will no
longer have the right to purchase the item. Any non-paying eBay member
will be blocked and will no longer be able to bid on any of our items. Any buyer who wishes to pay via Credit Card directly to our company may do so by contacting your seller to obtain a Credit Card Authorization Form. All Credit Card Transactions will have a 3% Credit Card Processing Fee Added. All items sold in Virginia will have a 5.3% Virginia sales tax added to the final price.
The sales tax will not be applied to shipping and handling. This tax is
due to recent changes made by PayPal and eBay requiring that taxes be
payed by sellers that sell $20,000+ or 200+ items per year. We are
sorry for any inconvenience.
SHIPPING
Shipping costs are calculated based on varying locations.
Items may be shipped via USPS, UPS or FedEX. Item will not necessarily
be shipped as stated in the auction. Shipping carrier is at the sellers
discretion, unless the buyer specifies that they would like to use
their own account to ship their items. Items can be shipped on the
buyers DHL account but the buyer must create the label and e-mail it to
us, along with scheduling the pick-up of their item by DHL.
Our pick-up days for shipments are Tuesday and Friday on a weekly
basis, with the exception of holidays. In the event that Tuesday or
Friday is a holiday, items will ship out the following business day.
For freight items, exceptions will be made to allow for trucking
companies and their schedules.
All items
MUST
be
shipped with insurance. eBay does not offer this service anymore but
because of the delicacy and value of most of our items, we must insure
them when shipping. The insurance cost will be a flat $3.00 fee for
ALL
items sold within the
US and a flat $5.00 fee for
ALL
items sold
internationally.
Please email us for any international shipping quotes. We reserve the
right to not ship certain items to a specific country for any reason.
Large or particularly heavy items will
NOT
be shipped
internationally unless the purchaser agrees to the shipping charges and
insurance fees before the end of the auction.
All international freight shipping must be arranged by the purchaser.
We will prepare all freight items for shipment including but not
limited to: palletizing, bubble wrap and crating (extra fee).
TERMS
This item is guaranteed to power on and function as pictured and
described above
ONLY
.
We make every effort to describe each item as best as we can and it is
your responsibility to read the auction in its entirety. Ask any
questions before you bid.
Returns and/or refunds will only be accepted if the item is damaged in
shipping and insurance was purchased or if the item is clearly not
described correctly and the tamper sticker has not been damaged or
adjusted. If damaged in shipping, please keep box and all packaging and
contact us so we can file a claim with the carrier. We will not accept
returns for any other reason.
Consumables (i.e. batteries, lights) are not guaranteed.
The equipment we sell is
USED
can and may have scratches, chips, cracks, blemishes or markings on the
unit from the previous owner.
Please know what it is and how to use the equipment
BEFORE
you bid on it.

Note:
All items (that are eligible) will be marked with a tamper sticker. If
the sticker is broken, tampered with or missing, absolutely
NO REFUND
will be accepted. The sticker number may not be
listed in the auction, however they are kept on file in our office.

Taken from the Internet:
These reusable ligating clip appliers, compatible with our non-absorbable clips, are designed for the ligation of tubular structures for open or endoscopic procedures. Simple to use, just position the ligating clip around the structure and apply pressure to the handle for our LX devices. Our patented lateral and transverse grooves on the inner clip surface provide excellent on-vessel clip security.
Applier and clips  on-vessel clip security for confident ligation. Instrument has patented lateral and transverse grooves to secure clips.
Long, thin, angled jaws  providing excellent visibility beyond structures and outstanding access.
Distal-tip closing  enables control and precise placement. Smooth, tumbled tip reduces trauma to vessels.
Mechanical Stop  limits maximum force.
Length: 10 1/2"
Handle Color: White
Clip Size: Medium
Policies & Definitions:
Shipping
Most items ship out within
1-2 BUSINESS
daysafter the payment clears. We allow local pick up. Handling fee of $9.99 and CA tax will apply. We combine shipping to save you money if the items can be combined and shipped safely. We offer a combined shipping discount of $3 for each additional item purchased.
Free shipping offers do NOT apply to Puerto Rico, Alaska, Hawaii andinternational transactions
Definitions:
GUARANTEED WORKING MEANS
:
Theitem is guaranteed workingas long as we receive it back within14 days from the purchase date. We will replace the item at no additional cost if the item is DOA. If replacement is Not available, we will refund the purchase price. Please bid accordingly
AS-IS MEANS:
The item is sold AS-IS Where is. This means that the buyer acknowledges that the item may or may Not be working and that the item may or may Not be complete and the buyer is willing to accept the risk. Please bid accordingly
Shipping and handlingcost is Not refundable under any circumstancesand the buyer is responsible for any additional shipping cost. please bid accordingly.

Taken from the Internet:
These reusable ligating clip appliers, compatible with our non-absorbable clips, are designed for the ligation of tubular structures for open or endoscopic procedures. Simple to use, just position the ligating clip around the structure and apply pressure to the handle for our LX devices. Our patented lateral and transverse grooves on the inner clip surface provide excellent on-vessel clip security.
Applier and clips  on-vessel clip security for confident ligation. Instrument has patented lateral and transverse grooves to secure clips.
Long, thin, angled jaws  providing excellent visibility beyond structures and outstanding access.
Distal-tip closing  enables control and precise placement. Smooth, tumbled tip reduces trauma to vessels.
Mechanical Stop  limits maximum force.
Product Code: LX210
Length: 10 1/2"
Handle Color: Silver
Clip Size: Medium

Shipping
Most items ship out within
1-2 BUSINESS
daysafter the payment clears. We allow local pick up. Handling fee of $9.99 and CA tax will apply. We combine shipping to save you money if the items can be combined and shipped safely. We offer a combined shipping discount of $3 for each additional item purchased.

Definitions:
GUARANTEED WORKING MEANS
:
Theitem is guaranteed workingas long as we receive it back within14 days from the purchase date. We will replace the item at no additional cost if the item is DOA. If replacement is Not available, we will refund the purchase price. Please bid accordingly
AS-IS MEANS:
The item is sold AS-IS Where is. This means that the buyer acknowledges that the item may or may Not be working and that the item may or may Not be complete and the buyer is willing to accept the risk. Please bid accordingly
Shipping and handlingcost is Not refundable under any circumstancesand the buyer is responsible for any additional shipping cost. please bid accordingly.
Return Policy
Every item we sell is carefully inspected before it is shipped and is tested to the best of our ability. If merchandise is Not as described please keep all packing materials, brochures, paperwork, etc. and contact us immediately after your package arrives for a return authorization claim number or to file a claim with the carrier on your behalf. * All claims MUST be made within 3 days of receipt of order *Shipping charges will not be refunded * Non-defective returned items are subject to a 30% restocking fee.

STATEMENT
We cannot and will not ship goods to the following Countries - Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Libya, North Korea, Sudan, UNITA (Angola), Afghanistan, Belarus, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Burma, Haiti, Indonesia, Kosovo, Liberia, Macedonia, Nigeria, Rwanda, Slovenia, Somalia, Syria, Yemen, Democratic Republic of the Congo (formerly Zaire), Zimbabwe.
POLICY
This equipment is offered with our as-represented guarantee. For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).
DISCLAIMER
Regardless of the origin of the equipment, documentation provided or identification appearing upon the equipment, the equipment described and offered here is in no way certified for, recommended for, or offered for any specific use. The purchaser agrees that the seller shall not be held responsible or liable for any injuries or damages, whether incidental or consequential, associated in any way with the equipment. The purchaser, by bidding on this equipment, indicates their acknowledgment of, and agreement to the terms of this disclaimer.

AS IS Items:
AS IS items have NO warranty and are sold for
PARTS
or
SALVAGE ONLY

DOA Items:

International Customers, please be advised that you are Responsible for:
a) Determining if these types of goods are allowed to be imported into your country and if required, that you have all necessary permits, Etc
b) Paying for Customs duties, taxes, Etc.
Payment :
Please DON'T take your time paying for your goods because it only delays the packing and shipping process.
We accept All forms of PayPal payments from customers with CONFIRMED shipping addresses ONLY ! otherwise, you will need to arrange for alternative method of payment with us for which you will receive a discount on top of the final purchase price. These alternative payment methods are secure as demonstrated by our
Feedback
however, if
Feedback
is not enough and you have your own requirements that you would like us to fulfill, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate you.
MyStoreMaps improve local and international eBay sales.

If you have any issues or concerns with your purchase please contact us , we will do our best to make it right.
Returns for defective items are accepted within 14 days of receipt. We offer an exchange or money back.
Shipping for returned items that are not defective is the responsibility of the buyer.
We ship exactly as described in auction. If manuals, software, packaging etc. are not mentioned, they are not included.
Returned items must be in the same condition as they were shipped.

We ship 1-2 business days after cleared payment (excluding holidays and weekends)

hipping please contact us before auction ends
and we will do our best to accommodate you.

Image URLs: 
Description: 
Units in very good working and cosmetic condition (please see pictures). Biomed tested.
Product Description
Manufacturer: Ethicon Endo-Surgery
Model Number: Generator 300
Category: Medical
Features:
The generator supplies the hand piece with electrical energy and facilitates selection of power levels, system monitoring, and system diagnostics.
System utilizes ultrasonic energy to enable hemostatic cutting and/or coagulation of soft tissue.
Vibrate longitudinally at 55.5 kilohertz - This ultrasonic vibration at the blade enhances its cutting ability
The Harmonic Generator 300 System is indicated for soft tissue incisions when bleeding control and minimal thermal injury are desired.
The Harmonic Generator 300 System instruments can be used as an adjunct to or substitute for electrosurgery, lasers, and steel scalpels.
Shipping out of the lower 48 United States is available at
an additional cost. Seller is an authorized used medical equipment dealer. Shore
Medical Equipment has been developed with integrity, diligence, cost
containment and quality products. These efforts have led to high customer
satisfaction for the past 25 years. Our commitment to our customers is what
sets us apart from other pre-owned medical equipment and service companies. EBay

equipment pieces need some maintenance and recertification. It is normal and
legal requirement. We strongly recommend that you get proper certification
prior to use and get the unit completely checked out.

bases for preventive maintenance on a lot of different types of equipment, It
is recommended that they be replaced as per need basis.
We remarket new and used equipment from hospitals and all our equipment comes
directly from hospitals. All the equipment we post on eBay is either in our
possession or has been thoroughly inspected by us. We don't list any items that
are in bad shape or are not desirable. We don't fix or repair any items to make

Condition
New
A brand-new, unused, unopened, undamaged item in its original
packaging (where packaging is applicable). Packaging should be the same as what
is found in a retail store, unless the item is handmade or was packaged by the
manufacturer in non-retail packaging, such as an unprinted box or plastic bag.
See the seller's listing for full details.
New other (see details)
A new, unused item with absolutely no signs of wear. The item may
be missing the original packaging, or in the original packaging but not sealed.
The item may be a factory second or a new, unused item with defects.See
the seller's listing for full details and description of any imperfections.
Manufacturer refurbished
An item that has been professionally restored to working order by
a manufacturer or manufacturer-approved vendor. This means the product has been
inspected, cleaned, and repaired to meet manufacturer specifications and is in
excellent condition. This item may or may not be in the original packaging. See
the seller's listing for full details.
Seller refurbished
An item that has been restored to working order by the eBay seller
or a third party not approved by the manufacturer. This means the item has been
inspected, cleaned, and repaired to full working order and is in excellent
condition. This item may or may not be in original packaging. See the seller's
listing for full details.
Used
An item that has been used previously. The item may have some
signs of cosmetic wear, but is fully operational and functions as intended.
This item may be a floor model or store return that has been used. See the
seller's listing for full details and description of any imperfections.
For parts or not working
An item that does not function as intended and is not fully
operational. This includes items that are defective in ways that render them
difficult to use, items that require service or repair, or items missing
essential components. See the seller's listing for full details
AS-IS MEANS:
The item is sold AS-IS Where is. This means that the buyer
acknowledges that the item may or may Not be working and that the item may or
may Not be complete and the buyer is willing to accept the risk. Please bid
accordingly
GUARANTEED WORKING MEANS :
The item is guaranteed working as long as we receive it back
within 15 days from the purchase date. We will replace the item at no
additional cost if the item is DOA. If replacement is Not available, we will
refund the purchase price. Please bid accordingly
Shipping and handling cost is Not refundable under any
circumstances and the buyer is responsible for any additional shipping cost.
please bid accordingly.

You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. POLICY
This equipment is offered with our as-represented guarantee. For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).
DISCLAIMER
Regardless of the origin of the equipment, documentation provided or identification appearing upon the equipment, the equipment described and offered here is in no way certified for, recommended for, or offered for any specific use. The purchaser agrees that the seller shall not be held responsible or liable for any injuries or damages, whether incidental or consequential, associated in any way with the equipment. The purchaser, by bidding on this equipment, indicates their acknowledgment of, and agreement to the terms of this disclaimer.

Any buyer who wishes to pay via Credit Card directly to our company may do so by contacting your seller to obtain a Credit Card Authorization Form. All Credit Card Transactions will have a 3% Credit Card Processing Fee Added. All items sold in Virginia will have a 5.3% Virginia sales tax added to the final price.
The sales tax will not be applied to shipping and handling. This tax is
due to recent changes made by PayPal and eBay requiring that taxes be
payed by sellers that sell $20,000+ or 200+ items per year. We are
sorry for any inconvenience.
SHIPPING
Shipping costs are calculated based on varying locations.
Items may be shipped via USPS, UPS or FedEX. Item will not necessarily
be shipped as stated in the auction. Shipping carrier is at the sellers
discretion, unless the buyer specifies that they would like to use
their own account to ship their items. Items can be shipped on the
buyers DHL account but the buyer must create the label and e-mail it to
us, along with scheduling the pick-up of their item by DHL.
Our pick-up days for shipments are Tuesday and Friday on a weekly
basis, with the exception of holidays. In the event that Tuesday or
Friday is a holiday, items will ship out the following business day.
For freight items, exceptions will be made to allow for trucking
companies and their schedules.
All items
MUST
be
shipped with insurance. eBay does not offer this service anymore but
because of the delicacy and value of most of our items, we must insure
them when shipping. The insurance cost will be a flat $3.00 fee for
ALL
items sold within the
US and a flat $5.00 fee for
ALL
items sold
internationally.
Please email us for any international shipping quotes. We reserve the
right to not ship certain items to a specific country for any reason.
Large or particularly heavy items will
NOT
be shipped
internationally unless the purchaser agrees to the shipping charges and
insurance fees before the end of the auction.
All international freight shipping must be arranged by the purchaser.
We will prepare all freight items for shipment including but not
limited to: palletizing, bubble wrap and crating (extra fee).

described above
ONLY

We make every effort to describe each item as best as we can and it is
your responsibility to read the auction in its entirety. Ask any
questions before you bid.

shipping and insurance was purchased or if the item is clearly not
described correctly and the tamper sticker has not been damaged or
adjusted. If damaged in shipping, please keep box and all packaging and
contact us so we can file a claim with the carrier. We will not accept
returns for any other reason.

USED
can and may have scratches, chips, cracks, blemishes or markings on the
unit from the previous owner.

you bid on it.

Payment
Payment Options:
We accept the below payment options. Please feel free to contact us with any questions regarding payments. You can reach us via email using "ask a question" in the eBay listing or by phone at 720-330-9307. Thank You!
1.
Paypal: We accept Paypal payment for items up to and including $2000. Any items selling for greater than $2000 will require an alternative payment method.
2.
Direct Credit Card payment to us over the phone. We accept Visa, Master Card, Discover, and American Express. Please call us at 720-330-9307 if you would like to pay for an item with a credit card. Credit cards are excepted for items in the amount of $2,000 or less.
3.
Business check or direct wire. We are happy to accept checks and wires, if you would like to pay with check or wire please email or call us and we will provide mailing address or wire information. Office: 720-330-9307

Company Name: Equipment Sales International LLC
Location: Denver, Colorado
Phone: 720-330-9307
Shipping
Shipping Information:
We pride ourselves in quality packaging to protect your item and fast shipping. In most cases your item will ship within 1 business day of payment receipt. We will send shipping notifications and tracking numbers as soon as item ships. Please see top of listing to determine what shipping method we will use for a particular item. We ship with USPS, UPS, and freight for larger items. Please feel free to contact us with any questions regarding shipping using "ask a question" in the eBay listing or by phone: 720-330-9307.
International Shipping: We have lots of experience with international shipping and can ship most items worldwide. If the international shipping price is not listed in the eBay listing, please contact us for a quote or with any questions.
Terms of Sale
Return Policy:
Most items we sell come with a 30 day money back guarantee. Please review the eBay listing to determine the guarantee that we are providing for the item. Some items have a longer guarantee, some have a shorter guarantee, and some items are sold as is. Please review the eBay listing of the item you are interested in to determine guarantee. Contact us with any questions. Thank You!

The below statement is required by eBay when listing in medical categories. For most items we sell there are no restrictions to purchase but please contact us if you are unsure.

STATEMENT
We cannot and will not ship goods to the following Countries - Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Libya, North Korea, Sudan, UNITA (Angola), Afghanistan, Belarus, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Burma, Haiti, Indonesia, Kosovo, Liberia, Macedonia, Nigeria, Rwanda, Slovenia, Somalia, Syria, Vietnam, Yemen, Democratic Republic of the Congo (formerly Zaire), Zimbabwe.
POLICY
This equipment is offered with our as-represented guarantee. For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).

30-Day DOA Warranty
This product carries a  30-Day DOA Warranty
.
DOA stands for Dead On Arrival, meaning that the
                        item did not function properly when it arrived. You may return
                        for a replacement when available, or a refund
                        of the item price within 30
                        days of receipt. Shipping and handling
                        fees are
                        non-refundable as they are paid to a 3rd party.
                        This is the only way we can keep selling at such low rates. Customer is
                        responsible for all shipping costs and the item's safe arrival at
                        our facility.
If
                        you
                        receive a DOA product, please contact us for a
Return Authorization #
. All items
                        must be returned in the exact condition received,
                        including any
                        accessories & original packaging when applicable. Please contact us
                        by sending a message through eBay or calling.  Please read below for exclusions.
Our warranty excludes all consumable goods, eg. toner, ink cartridges,
                        bulbs, batteries, all As-Is items, missing accessories not stated
                        in our ad as pictured, any and all compatibility issues, etc.
                        Compatibility issues are not considered DOA. Please check with the
                        manufacturer
before purchasing
.

                        preparation for carrier pick-up, a requirement for all carriers.

Damaged Shipments
If item arrives damaged by the carrier, please reject shipment and contact us immediately. If you do receive the package, submit clear images of the packaging/box and damaged item from multiple angles. DO NOT discard the packaging. Save packaging for carrier claim. Carrier will often come back to pick up the shipment. We cannot file a claim without the packaging and proper images. Thank you for your help and understanding.
Special Handling with Foam
High Value
items requiring special packaging will be foamed into the box. DO NOT lift up on the top plastic sheet or it'll make a mess. Lift foam out of box by grabbing 2nd plastic sheet from both sides.   If you accidentally peel the top plastic off, exposing the foam, just look for the next layer of plastic to lift the foam out cleanly.

						clear before your item may be picked up or shipped.

Science & Technology
Proven
Bactericidal Advantage
SURGICEL
Family of
Absorbable Hemostats is the
first
and
only
absorbable hemostat that is
proven
bactericidal against a broad range of
gram-positive and gram-negative organisms including various antibiotic
resistant bacteria (MRSA, VRE, PRSP and MRSE)
In vivo animal studies have
demonstrated that SURGICEL
Absorbable Hemostats, in
contrast to other hemostatic agents studied, do not enhance infection.
The experimental model: 140 guinea
pigs were utilized to simulate the development of intra-abdominal abscess
and/or peritonitis, which can occur in humans when a large blood clot becomes
contaminated.
Clinical significance of these animal
or in vitro data has yet to be determined.
Closing SURGICEL
Absorbable Hemostats in a contaminated wound without
drainage may lead to complications and should be avoided.

All items sold in Virginia will have a 5.3% Virginia sales tax added to the final price.
The sales tax will not be applied to shipping and handling. This tax is
due to recent changes made by PayPal and eBay requiring that taxes be
payed by sellers that sell $20,000+ or 200+ items per year. We are
sorry for any inconvenience.
SHIPPING
Shipping costs are calculated based on varying locations.
Items may be shipped via USPS, UPS or FedEX. Item will not necessarily
be shipped as stated in the auction. Shipping carrier is at the sellers
discretion, unless the buyer specifies that they would like to use
their own account to ship their items. Items can be shipped on the
buyers DHL account but the buyer must create the label and e-mail it to
us, along with scheduling the pick-up of their item by DHL.
Our pick-up days for shipments are Tuesday and Friday on a weekly
basis, with the exception of holidays. In the event that Tuesday or
Friday is a holiday, items will ship out the following business day.
For freight items, exceptions will be made to allow for trucking
companies and their schedules.
All items
MUST
be
shipped with insurance. eBay does not offer this service anymore but
because of the delicacy and value of most of our items, we must insure
them when shipping. The insurance cost will be a flat $3.00 fee for
ALL
items sold within the
US and a flat $5.00 fee for
ALL
items sold
internationally.
Please email us for any international shipping quotes. We reserve the
right to not ship certain items to a specific country for any reason.
Large or particularly heavy items will
NOT
be shipped
internationally unless the purchaser agrees to the shipping charges and
insurance fees before the end of the auction.
All international freight shipping must be arranged by the purchaser.
We will prepare all freight items for shipment including but not
limited to: palletizing, bubble wrap and crating (extra fee).

Description: 
LOT OF 2 ANTIQUE MEDICAL GLASS TUBES / JOHNSONS ETHICON / CURITY CHROMIC
This auction is for a lot of 2 antique medical glass tubes. I think they are some sort of thread inside but I'm no doctor so please look at the pictures to see what is included.
PAYMENTS
We accept PAYPAL, plus other options like local pickup for FREE and coming soon - ProPay!!  We do ship ASAP upon payment as noted above within 1 business day 95% of the time!! We do file Non Paying Bidder Alert with Ebay for non-payments!!!
Furthermore, Ebay's new payment rules of requiring all Ebay bidders to use an online electronic form of payment like Paypal, Propay, etc... which has scared away many of my loyal and repeat customers who do have have this form of payment method available. DO NOT let this be anobstacle to your bidding on any of my items!! I welcome all bids, even from those bidders who do not have a Paypal account.
NO RESERVE AUCTION!!!!
Bid early and do not let this one get away!
I usually have many items listed on Ebay at the same time.
If you win more than one auction, I will combine your shipping and handling to save you money $$$ based on weight and distance.
BID IN CONFIDENCE  CHECK MY FEEDBACK!
My goal is your satisfaction. I leave positive feedback right after the payment is received for all payments!! If you plan to leave anything less than positive feedback and 5 stars - please let me know so that I can work out any problems that you may have.
INTERNATIONAL BIDDERS - PLEASE READ
Attention all international bidders - I welcome bids from all around this great world of ours!! But please note that I only ship outside of the United States via USPS (United States Postal Service) by Priority Mail ONLY unless its a smaller item in which case I can ship via USPS First Class mail if the value is under $50.00 in value. The only exception is with the country of Italy. All purchases from Italy will only be shipped via USPS Priority Mail. This is for both your protection, speedy delivery of your purchase and for delivery confirmation/tracking. Please feel free to contact me for a S&H quote but please do so upto 24 hours before the auction ends. I'm not always home in front of my computer when my many listings end. Please also be aware of your countries shipping policies with importing items from the United States as some have various taxes, custom dues, VAT taxes, etc....
Import duties, taxes and charges are
not included
in the item price or shipping charges. These charges are the buyers responsibility.
Please check with your countrys customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to bidding/buying.
SHIPPING & HANDLING FOR US BIDDERS
Shipping and handling is set at a fixed rate for for the upper 48 states. My goal is to ALWAYS ship out the next business day!!! I normally ship using either USPS Priority Mail shipping or FEDEX Ground shipping so that you get your items right away!!! Please note that Ebay doesn't have a shipping option for Fedex so I'm forced to UPS Ground as the shipping option on their system but items will be shipped via Fedex instead. Hawaii, Alaska, Guamand Puerto Rico will be slightly higher.
Pennsylvania Residents must add 6% sales tax to your winning bid
No charge for local pickup on any of my items!!
MOST items are shipped the next business day.
Larger/Heavier items are shipped via Fedex within 2 business days.
PAYMENT AND RETURNS
We accept PAYPAL, plus other options like local pickup for FREE and coming soon - ProPay!!  We do ship ASAP upon payment as noted above.We do file Non Paying Bidder Alert with Ebay for non-payments!
Due to the nature of most of my items being vintage, collectible and antiques - items are considered AS-IS but I do provide a return policy if you are not satisfied with your purchase. Returns must be returned within14 days of receipt and exactly as sold. Refunds will be based on total amount paid minus shipping - shipping charges are non-refundable. If the item is new - itmay be covered under the manufactures warranty. Paypal payments will be given as a refund back to your account.

MED Online Policy:
Guarantee / Return:
Full 14 Day Money Back Guarantee Terms:
If you are not satisfied with your purchase you may return the item(s) for a full money back refund on the purchased item(s) within 14-days of delivery. To qualify for a full refund (item(s) only, shipping is not refundable), buyer must pay return shipping with tracking and insurance, ship with the same form of transportation it was delivered with, and have item(s) returned in the same condition as well as in the same packaging as they were originally received with. Warranty stickers on returned item(s) must be clearly in tact. Also, tracking must be provided through eBay, proving the item(s) are shipped back within 14-days of receiving the item(s).
Shipping:
Shipments are through Van Lines Transportation, Freight Transportation, or you may arrange local pickup at our commercially zoned dock. Shipping charges are applied to the invoice at cost plus a $35 preparation fee if shipping via Freight to cover time & materials for strapping it to a pallet. No fee for Van Lines unless it needs to be strapped to a pallet. Feel free to ask for a shipping quote before buying this item. We will not ship internationally unless there is prior, written approval from Garret Purrington. If you need this item crated - contact us for a specific crate-quote.
The following details are required in order to determine the cost of shipping:
Is the delivery to a commercially zoned or residentially zoned address?
Will the delivery be to a loading dock and/or will you have a fork lift to remove the item from the truck?
Is the delivery address tractor trailer accessible?
Are there any special requirements for delivery in addition to standard Freight/Van Lines included services (ex. Stairs, Elevator, Doorway removal, Delivery is more than 50 feet away from the truck, Small truck requirement for delivery, Inside delivery required, Removal from pallet required, Unpacking required, etc.)?
Call or email me anytime; I am here to help. We will accept local pickup as well. I will combine shipping if you purchase more than one item from me at a time - just let me know in the notes.
.
Payment:
Payment is due within 3 days of the auction close. For international orders, we only accept PayPal or wire transfer. The item will ship after payment has cleared.
All Buyers:
The item is not currently certified for patient use. This item must be certified by an authorized technician prior to patient use. MED makes no claims of certification, either expressed or implied.

Return Policy
The seller reserves the right to choose to either
replace or refund at our discretion, based on the availability and feasibility
of replacement product.
In the event of refund due to product failure,
full purchase price will be refunded to buyer within three business days
following receipt & inspection of return. Items must be returned in
original packaging, insured for purchase value.
Should Seller accept a return of working product,
or if buyer requests an exchange, a 15% re-stocking fee will apply, based on
the final selling price, with a $5.00 minimum.
For items that may occasionally be received
damaged in transit, buyer must notify seller immediately upon receipt. Original
packaging must remain intact. Seller will initiate a damaged claim with the
appropriate carrier, and determination of refund/replacement will be made by
seller following carrier's inspection of the damaged package.

Refunds will be issued via check within 7 business days after the receipt of the equipment. All return items must be in original condition, packaging, sealed and unused, tamper tag must be intact. The responsibility is between the customer and the carrier.No refunds will be given when stated in listing.
Shipping Terms
Items ship within 1 to 3 business days after payment is received. Orders will be shipped the most cost effective means. All items are packaged and shipped in a professional manner. The tracking number will be sent to you. Combined shipping discounts are available for multiple item purchases. Flat rate fees are for Continental US shipping ONLY. Alaska, Hawaii and all other NON Contiguous Territories are extra cost.

About Warranty:
We guarantees new equipment other than accessories to be free from defects in workmanship and materials for a period of twelve months (six months for spare parts) from the date of shipment under normal use and service. Our company's obligation under this warranty is limited to repairing, at our company's option, any part which upon our company's examination proves defective.
Return Policy:
If you receive a defective item which you want to return, please contact us within 5 days from the day you receive the item. All return items must be returned with its original packaging and accessories. If we confirm the damage happened during the shipment, we will bear the shipping cost for return.
We will refund the money to you when we get the return items. Or replace item for you free of charge.
If you have any questions or Dissatisfaction, please contact us via ebay message,
we will try our best to help you to solve the problem and give you satisfied answer,
please do not leave us Negative or Neutral feedback, thanks!

Taxes, Customs & Duties:
We don't add taxes, VAT or other hidden charges. You pay us what you see on the invoice, i.e. goods subtotal + shipping cost (not include duties). Please find out as much as you can about your import taxes in your own country before bidding the item. You need to pay for the import duties in case that occurred for certain goods, or you may kindly give us some suggestions about that, we promise to do our best to help you!
Return policy:
If you have a defective item, you want to return or discount. Please contact us within 2 days from you receive the shipment. All return items must be returned with it's original packaging and accessories. Customer is responsible for shipping charges on returned items. we will refund the money to you when we get the return items. Or replace item for you.
Feedback:
Customer is always NO.1
We care about our valued customers and understand the concerns and frustrations you might have, and will try our best to resolve the issues.. We strive to answer all emails as quickly as possible, but due to high email volume it may take time for us to reply. Thanks in advance for your patience!
Contact us first before leaving a negative, we will find a solution to meet your requirement and enhance the satisfaction.
Due to some ISP SPAM filter settings, you may not be able to receive our email replies; if you have problems receiving our emails, you may need to use a different email account to contact us.
If you are unsatisfied with the item for any reason within 3 days of item receipt, you can return it for a refund(deducting the shippng).

Terms of Sale
Payment is expected within 2 days of auction close, unless other arrangements are made. If payment is not made within 2 days an unpaid item case will be open with ebay.
We accept payments through PayPal.
We scan the serial numbers of all outgoing items for verification if a return is accepted.
If we were not able to test an item, or it is clearly non-functioning in some way, we may sell it as is. If we decide to do that, it will be non-refundable.
Double check your shipping address before checkout. We do not re-ship items for free.
Shipping
We understand the importance of Professional and Prompt delivery. We take pride in our full time shipping and receiving department and we insure that every item that leaves our doors is packaged very well. We will also combine shipping, just send us a message with your terms and we will be happy to work with you.
All items listed as free shipping please be sure to understand that is within the Continental US only. Flat rate fees are for Continental US Shipping Only. Alaska, Hawaii, and all other non-Contiguous territories are extra cost. International orders will be shipped USPS priority International unless otherwise requested or noted. The cost will be determined upon purchase or request. If you have a question about shipping, please email before bidding on an item.
International customers are responsible for customs duties, taxes, tariffs, or other charges on items shipped to a foreign country. If an item is shipped to a US exporter, once it is received by the exporter we are no longer responsible for the item.
Return Policy
We take every necessary precaution to yield the best possible outcome with each transaction, but sometimes you still need a return. With us, you can Purchase with Confidence knowing that in an unfortunate case, we will always make it right for our buyers. Please check our Return Policy before you bid as it is different for each item.
All returned items must have intact tamper tags. Any
returns
with broken tamper tags will not be refunded.
A 10% Restocking fee will apply on returns.
Refunds
Buyer is responsible for return shipping cost. All return items must be in original condition, packaging, sealed and unused. Refund will be issued through PayPal. If there is damage to the unit from carrier upon its delivery, please do not dispose of the packaging. All our items are shipped with insurance, and we will need pictures and the packaging. We reserve the right to reject the item after inspection, (items with physical damage or incomplete packaging, incomplete items).In the event that physical damage is caused during transit of a return, it is the customers responsibility to contact the carrier to start a damage claim upon receiving a notification from us.The responsibility is between the customer and the carrier.
All returned items must have intact tamper tags. Any
returns
with broken tamper tags will not be refunded.
If the product is sold as-is or sold for parts not working, there are no returns or refunds.
Service
We have a full time staff that is devoted to offering great items, at a great price, and excellent customer service to back it up. We understand that the success of our business is built on Reputation, and we will go to the necessary lengths to always make sure our customers are taken care of.
We do the best we can, but we are not experts on every product we sell. If you have any questions, please ask before purchasing. If for any reason you are unsatisfied with a purchase, please contact us so we can make it right. Please do not open a case or leave negative feedback before contacting us. The satisfaction of our customers is our number one priority.

favorites list

Low pelvic
access
Unique
curved head design provides a 40mm cut line in a 30 mm space allowing for lower
pelvic access
The
CONTOUR Curved Cutter Stapler has a 17mm smaller head width than Covidiens
Radial Reload (with Tri-Staple Technology) to enable deep pelvic access.*
Larger
jaw aperture facilitates maneuverability and mobility along the colon
Increased
control
Manual
pin placement captures intended tissue before closing device
The
intermediate locking position captures the tissue with the jaws partially open,
allowing for repositioning of the tissue within the instrument if desired. The
closure trigger can be released and the jaw will remain open to allow for final
positioning of the tissue before it is cut and stapled. Throughout this
process, the retaining pin is fully engaged.
Enhanced
usability
Breakthrough
washer provides audible and tactile feedback every firing and new stainless
steel anvil with every cartridge
With
reloadable cartridges, the device may be fired up to 6 times in a single
procedure
The
CONTOUR Curved Cutter Stapler can be used in colorectal, gastrointestinal and
skeletal muscle stapling procedures. It allows for lower pelvic access in LAR
procedures and provides a clean transection of muscle belly in procedures such
as above/below-knee amputations.

Warranty:
This item comes with a 30            day warranty.  During that time we will refund the purchase price (less            shipping).
Refunds will be given            once the item is received.
This item is pre-owned.             Common sense dictates that before it is used in conjunction with patient care,            it should be checked out thoroughly by your professional biomedical staff.
We            will not warranty items if buyer does not follow our shipping recommendations            listed above.   Calibrated or sensitive electronic equipment should be sent "air ride, blank            wrapped" and should not be sent straight freight if it is too large for            UPS limits.
Payment:
We            accept PayPal, Visa, MasterCard, and American Express.
Payment            must be made in full within 48 hours of winning auction.
Tax:
Buyers in Minnesota will be charged sales tax
About Scientific Equipment Liquidators, Inc.
This is a corporate ebay account, questions will be answered Monday through Friday.
Scientific Equipment Liquidators has been in business since 1977 and is            located in Big Lake, MN.  We buy and sell used medical equipment from 1            piece, 1 department, or an entire hospital.  We deal in all disciplines            of used medical equipment. Phone 888-248-8221.
Company website is
http://MedUsed.com

"The sale of            this item may be subject to regulation by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration            and state and local regulatory agencies. If the item is subject to FDA regulation, I            will verify your status as an authorized purchaser of this item before shipping            of the item."

partial boxes of Ethicon Ethi-Pack Surgical Steel sutures. These type 316L

(B&S 35, 0.0084) Code: DS-135.

new, the wires have not been individually counted.

stainless steel jewelry making, or for their original purpose.

Item Description
ETHICON Forceps hemostatic clip applying angled 45 deg 10.50"  Lot Of 2

ETHICON Forceps hemostatic clip applying angled 45 deg 10.50" Lot Of 2. They are used but in like new condition.

1530 Texas Street

The purchaser agrees that the seller shall not be held responsible or liable for any injuries or damages, whether incidental or consequential, associated in any way with the equipment. If you would like this item insured please contact us before you submit payment, otherwise it will ship without insurance.
The shipping department closes at noon each day.
Therefore, any payments received after 10:00 a.m. will ship the next business day.
Please use the eBay shipping calculator to determine the shipping cost to your zip code. This will also calculate shipping to other countries.
There is a small handling cost added to the actual shipping cost to cover some of our expenses (see About Me page for details). If you are uncertain or have questions regarding the cost please email us before making your purchase.
If combining multiple orders, please contact us to verify the shipping cost as the calculator does not take into account the bigger box sizes, etc. Sometimes this will increase or decrease the cost depending on the items purchased. We don't want to overcharge you nor do we want to lose money on the shipping cost.
Used Items:
All used working items have a 14 Day (FOURTEEN) DOA warranty from the time of receipt.
AS IS Items:
AS IS items have NO warranty and are sold for
PARTS
or
SALVAGE ONLY
!
DOA Items:
We will exchange any item found to be defective, or, at the customers request, parts may be sent to replace a part found to be defective and causing the item to malfunction.
PLEASE NOTE
:
To be covered by Paypal we have to ship to the address listed in the Paypal payment. So, before submitting your payment please make sure that the address listed is where you want the item shipped. Please do NOT email after you've made your payment and ask us to send it to another address.
Payment must be received within 4 days after notification of total payment due.

sure you understand these terms before making a purchase.

INTERNATIONAL CUSTOMERS
All Items ship from the United States via Federal Express.
We do not ship using the United States Postal Service (USPS).
Please email Postal Code for Accurate Shipping Costs before Submitting payment.  Your shipping may be less than the eBay calculation.
We will collect for additional shipping if shipping charges are incorrect before shipment.
We will not under value an item on the customs form.
We will not mark a package as "Sample" or "Gift".
International Buyer is Responsible for Any and All Custom Related Activities Such as:
Knowing if Purchased Goods are permitted by your Country's Customs Laws.
Knowing what type of buyer can purchase these goods according to your Country's Customs Laws.
Acquiring Any and All Certificates or Licenses required to import purchased goods into your country.
Paying Any and All Customs Related Duties, Taxes, and Fees required by your Country's Customs Laws.
If we are asked to submit additional paperwork required by Customs Laws that require payment of additional fees, we will insist upon reimbursement from the buyer before submitting this paperwork.
We do not refund international shipping costs for items returned that could not clear customs.
SHIPPING INFORMATION
All Items ship from the United States via Federal Express.
We do not ship using the United States Postal Service (USPS).
Items over $250 require a signature for PayPal Protection and will be billed accordingly.
We will collect for additional shipping if shipping charges are incorrect before shipment.
For Buyers outside the Contiental United States (Lower 48 States): Please email Postal Code for accurate shipping costs before submitting payment.  Your shipping may be less than the eBay calculation.
We do not ship to APO/FPO addresses.
Orders will be shipped the next business day after receipt of payment.

Return Policy
The seller reserves the right to choose to either
replace or refund at our discretion, based on the availability and feasibility
of replacement product.
In the event of refund due to product failure,
full purchase price will be refunded to buyer within three business days
following receipt & inspection of return. Items must be returned in
original packaging, insured for purchase value.
Should Seller accept a return of working product,
or if buyer requests an exchange, a 15% re-stocking fee will apply, based on
the final selling price, with a $5.00 minimum.
For items that may occasionally be received
damaged in transit, buyer must notify seller immediately upon receipt. Original
packaging must remain intact. Seller will initiate a damaged claim with the
appropriate carrier, and determination of refund/replacement will be made by
seller following carrier's inspection of the damaged package.

Terms of Sale
Payment is expected within 2 days of auction close, unless other arrangements are made. If payment is not made within 2 days an unpaid item case will be open with ebay.
We accept payments through PayPal.
We scan the serial numbers of all outgoing items for verification if a return is accepted.
If we were not able to test an item, or it is clearly non-functioning in some way, we may sell it as is. If we decide to do that, it will be non-refundable.
Double check your shipping address before checkout. We do not re-ship items for free.
Shipping
We understand the importance of Professional and Prompt delivery. We take pride in our full time shipping and receiving department and we insure that every item that leaves our doors is packaged very well. We will also combine shipping, just send us a message with your terms and we will be happy to work with you.
All items listed as free shipping please be sure to understand that is within the Continental US only. Flat rate fees are for Continental US Shipping Only. Alaska, Hawaii, and all other non-Contiguous territories are extra cost. International orders will be shipped USPS priority International unless otherwise requested or noted. The cost will be determined upon purchase or request. If you have a question about shipping, please email before bidding on an item.
International customers are responsible for customs duties, taxes, tariffs, or other charges on items shipped to a foreign country. If an item is shipped to a US exporter, once it is received by the exporter we are no longer responsible for the item.
Return Policy
We take every necessary precaution to yield the best possible outcome with each transaction, but sometimes you still need a return. With us, you can Purchase with Confidence knowing that in an unfortunate case, we will always make it right for our buyers. Please check our Return Policy before you bid as it is different for each item.
All returned items must have intact tamper tags. Any
returns
with broken tamper tags will not be refunded.
A 10% Restocking fee will apply on returns.
Refunds
Buyer is responsible for return shipping cost. All return items must be in original condition, packaging, sealed and unused. Refund will be issued through PayPal. If there is damage to the unit from carrier upon its delivery, please do not dispose of the packaging. All our items are shipped with insurance, and we will need pictures and the packaging. We reserve the right to reject the item after inspection, (items with physical damage or incomplete packaging, incomplete items).In the event that physical damage is caused during transit of a return, it is the customers responsibility to contact the carrier to start a damage claim upon receiving a notification from us.The responsibility is between the customer and the carrier.
All returned items must have intact tamper tags. Any
returns
with broken tamper tags will not be refunded.
If the product is sold as-is or sold for parts not working, there are no returns or refunds.
Service
We have a full time staff that is devoted to offering great items, at a great price, and excellent customer service to back it up. We understand that the success of our business is built on Reputation, and we will go to the necessary lengths to always make sure our customers are taken care of.
We do the best we can, but we are not experts on every product we sell. If you have any questions, please ask before purchasing. If for any reason you are unsatisfied with a purchase, please contact us so we can make it right. Please do not open a case or leave negative feedback before contacting us. RC Fulfillment Store Policies
Images:
We use the exact image that you will be receiving. We take pictures of all our products so you know what exactly you will be receiving.
Shipping Rates & Information
Most items are shipped via United States Postal Service or UPS.
We do not offer local pick-up. All items must be shipped on our shipper ID. We cannot use other accounts. All international shipments are United States Postal Priority. We do not use First Class International shipping.
Combined Shipping:
Please do not complete checkout prior to adding your last item. We will send a updated invoice after all items are added to cart.
International Duties, Taxes and Fees:
International customers may be subject to additional import duties, taxes and other fees. These charges are the responsibility of the customer and must be paid upon delivery. Your shipping charge includes only the cost of shipping to you. Charges to clear your customs office for taxes and other charges are the responsibility of the buyer. These charges are beyond our control and vary by country. We state the actual purchase price for declared value. We will not change this amount.
Please note that any taxes, duties, or import fees charged by your government are your responsibility. These vary by country. Please contact your local customs agent for further information.
All international shipments include a commercial invoice with the required declared value, which cannot be changed.
Order processing:
Orders are daily, Monday through Friday. We do not ship on weekends or National holidays. Once payments are verified, items are typically shipped within two business days.Orders paid by Paypal and e-Checks are only shipped to the confirmed address, no exceptions. If address is unconfirmed, payment will be refunded and auction cancelled.
Reduced shipping for multiple items
:
We combine shipping for multiple items as long as you do not complete checkout prior to adding additional items. For orders with multiple items, you will be charged the appropriate additional item fee after the first item which will be charged at the single item rate.
Insurance:
All items are insured. If your item is damaged in shipment, we will work with you to remedy the situation with shipping carriers.
Order tracking:
You will receive an order confirmation with a tracking number once the item ships. The status of the order may be tracked on currier website. Tracking is not available for Military APO/FPO shipments.
Military shipments:
We ship all items to APO/FPO addresses via US Postal Service at the above rates. Please allow up to 4-6 weeks for delivery. Tracking for these shipments is not available.
Payment Information
Payment and Sales Tax:
All items must be paid within 7 days. You will receive a payment notification after seven days. If payment is not received by the 7th day, your auction will be revoked and considered non-paid. A non-paying bidder report will be filed with eBay. If you bid on the item in error, you may be subject to a 10% relisting fee. All payments must be made in US Currency.
State law requires that we charge sales tax on all orders shipped to the states of California at 8.75%.
We accept Paypal payments. If your paypal account is linked to a checking or other banking account, payment may be considered an e-check.
Paypal e-checks
will not be shipped until Paypal provides verification of payment. This requires 3-5 business days from the date that checkout is completed. All shipments, no exceptions will only be shipped to the confirmed address with Paypal. If not confirmed, payment will be refunded, and auction cancelled.
Return Policies
Your satisfaction is important to us. If for any reason, you are not happy with your item, it may be returned within 7 days of receiving the item. The item must be received in the same condition as it was sold and include all accessories, if applicable, item can not be returned in a used state. Buyer is responsible for cost of shipping back to us for refund. Refunded amount is only the auction price, shipping is not refunded.
Return Guidelines:
The buyer is responsible for return shipping costs, duties and taxes.
Refund will be issued on the product price (and applicable sales tax) only. Original shipping is not refundable.
Items must be received in the same condition as they were sold and must include all inserts, accessories, if applicable.
All items will be inspected prior to refund being issued.
Refunds will be issued within 3 days of receipt of the item.
Issues with shipment:
Each item that is shipped is insured. If you received a damaged item please contact customer service as soon as possible and we will work with you to rectify the situation to your satisfaction. If the item you received was not the item that you ordered, please call us as soon as possible, through Ebay Message Service. We will arrange to replace your item and pick-up the incorrect item as quickly as possible.
Item condition
We guarantee the accuracy of each description. Listings will describe item or items of their conditions.
Warranty
We will be happy to help you with any warranty and repair issues. Please contact us and we will do our best to assist you with your issues.
Contact Information
Business Hours:
Customer service business hours are Monday-Friday 10:00 am -5:00 pm West Coast Standard Time. We try to respond to emails in a timely manner.

Service Policy
Customer is always NO.1
1. We care about our valued customers and understand the concerns and frustrations you might have, and will try our best to resolve the issues.
2. We strive to answer all emails as quickly as possible, but due to high email volume it may take time for us to reply. Thanks in advance for your patience!
3. Contact us firstly before leaving a negative, we will find a solution to meet your requirement and enhance the satisfaction.
4. Due to some ISP SPAM filter settings, you may not be able to receive our email replies; if you have problems receiving our emails, you may need to use a different email account to contact us.
5. If you are unsatisfied with the item for any reason within 3 days of item receipt, you can return it for a refund (deducting the shippng).

2. If we are out of work ,please kindly be patient and considerable to give us a little more time. We will contact you and solve the problems soon when we get back for working. Thank you so much for your cooperation!

STATEMENT
We cannot and will not ship goods to the following Countries - Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Libya, North Korea, Sudan, UNITA (Angola), Afghanistan, Belarus, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Burma, Haiti, Indonesia, Kosovo, Liberia, Macedonia, Nigeria, Rwanda, Slovenia, Somalia, Syria, Vietnam, Yemen, Democratic Republic of the Congo (formerly Zaire), Zimbabwe.
POLICY
This equipment is offered with our as-represented guarantee. For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).

The purchaser agrees that the seller shall not be held responsible or liable for any injuries or damages, whether incidental or consequential, associated in any way with the equipment. The purchaser, by bidding on this equipment, indicates their acknowledgment of, and agreement to the terms of this disclaimer.

filed with the shipping entity. We will not accept returns for any other
reason.
