expressed or implied, unless stated above. The buyer will not hold the seller
or eBay responsible for the appropriate or inappropriate use of this device
either by the user or a third party. Once purchased, it is the sole
responsibility of the purchaser to assume any and all liability from the use of
this device. The sale of this item may be subject to strict regulation by the
U.S. Food and Drug Administration and state and local regulatory agencies. If
so, do not bid on this item unless you are an authorized purchaser. If the item
is subject to FDA regulation, I will verify your status as an authorized
purchaser of this item before shipping. Please note before bidding that any
medical equipment purchased should be completely tested by a qualified
biomedical technician prior to being put into service.

Equipment Ratings
Each item in our warehouse is rated on a 1-5 scale when it is checked into inventory. If an item needs minor repairs which we plan to do prior to sale, it is rated based on its repaired condition.
Rating
Function
Cosmetics
1-New
Good
New in Box
2-Excellent
Good
Only minor blemishes if any
3-Good
Good
Shows normal wear for age
4-Fair
Good
Notable flaws (ie cracks or dents in casing, missing trim pieces, poor paint, etc)
5-Poor
Parts Unit
Unit may have significant damage

Image URLs: 
Description: 
Units in very good working and cosmetic condition (please see pictures). Biomed tested.
Product Description
Manufacturer: Ethicon Endo-Surgery
Model Number: Generator 300
Category: Medical
Features:
The generator supplies the hand piece with electrical energy and facilitates selection of power levels, system monitoring, and system diagnostics.
System utilizes ultrasonic energy to enable hemostatic cutting and/or coagulation of soft tissue.
Vibrate longitudinally at 55.5 kilohertz - This ultrasonic vibration at the blade enhances its cutting ability
The Harmonic Generator 300 System is indicated for soft tissue incisions when bleeding control and minimal thermal injury are desired.
The Harmonic Generator 300 System instruments can be used as an adjunct to or substitute for electrosurgery, lasers, and steel scalpels.

This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).

The sales tax will not be applied to shipping and handling. This tax is
due to recent changes made by PayPal and eBay requiring that taxes be
payed by sellers that sell $20,000+ or 200+ items per year. We are
sorry for any inconvenience.
SHIPPING
Shipping costs are calculated based on varying locations.
Items may be shipped via USPS, UPS or FedEX. Item will not necessarily
be shipped as stated in the auction. Shipping carrier is at the sellers
discretion, unless the buyer specifies that they would like to use
their own account to ship their items. Items can be shipped on the
buyers DHL account but the buyer must create the label and e-mail it to
us, along with scheduling the pick-up of their item by DHL.
Our pick-up days for shipments are Tuesday and Friday on a weekly
basis, with the exception of holidays. In the event that Tuesday or
Friday is a holiday, items will ship out the following business day.
For freight items, exceptions will be made to allow for trucking
companies and their schedules.
All items
MUST
be
shipped with insurance. eBay does not offer this service anymore but
because of the delicacy and value of most of our items, we must insure
them when shipping. The insurance cost will be a flat $3.00 fee for
ALL
items sold within the
US and a flat $5.00 fee for
ALL
items sold
internationally.

right to not ship certain items to a specific country for any reason.

NOT
be shipped
internationally unless the purchaser agrees to the shipping charges and
insurance fees before the end of the auction.
All international freight shipping must be arranged by the purchaser.

limited to: palletizing, bubble wrap and crating (extra fee).

STATEMENT
We cannot and will not ship goods to the following Countries - Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Libya, North Korea, Sudan, UNITA (Angola), Afghanistan, Belarus, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Burma, Haiti, Indonesia, Kosovo, Liberia, Macedonia, Nigeria, Rwanda, Slovenia, Somalia, Syria, Vietnam, Yemen, Democratic Republic of the Congo (formerly Zaire), Zimbabwe.

The sales tax will not be applied to shipping and handling. This tax is
due to recent changes made by PayPal and eBay requiring that taxes be
payed by sellers that sell $20,000+ or 200+ items per year. We are
sorry for any inconvenience.
SHIPPING
Shipping costs are calculated based on varying locations.
Items may be shipped via USPS, UPS or FedEX. Item will not necessarily
be shipped as stated in the auction. Shipping carrier is at the sellers
discretion, unless the buyer specifies that they would like to use
their own account to ship their items. Items can be shipped on the
buyers DHL account but the buyer must create the label and e-mail it to
us, along with scheduling the pick-up of their item by DHL.
Our pick-up days for shipments are Tuesday and Friday on a weekly
basis, with the exception of holidays. In the event that Tuesday or
Friday is a holiday, items will ship out the following business day.
For freight items, exceptions will be made to allow for trucking
companies and their schedules.
All items
MUST
be
shipped with insurance. eBay does not offer this service anymore but
because of the delicacy and value of most of our items, we must insure
them when shipping. The insurance cost will be a flat $3.00 fee for
ALL
items sold within the
US and a flat $5.00 fee for
ALL
items sold
internationally.

right to not ship certain items to a specific country for any reason.
Large or particularly heavy items will
NOT

internationally unless the purchaser agrees to the shipping charges and
insurance fees before the end of the auction.
All international freight shipping must be arranged by the purchaser.

limited to: palletizing, bubble wrap and crating (extra fee).

30-Day DOA Warranty
This product carries a  30-Day DOA Warranty
.
DOA stands for Dead On Arrival, meaning that the
                        item did not function properly when it arrived. You may return
                        for a replacement when available, or a refund
                        of the item price within 30
                        days of receipt. Shipping and handling
                        fees are
                        non-refundable as they are paid to a 3rd party.
                        This is the only way we can keep selling at such low rates. Customer is
                        responsible for all shipping costs and the item's safe arrival at
                        our facility.
If
                        you
                        receive a DOA product, please contact us for a
Return Authorization #
. All items
                        must be returned in the exact condition received,
                        including any
                        accessories & original packaging when applicable. Please contact us
                        by sending a message through eBay or calling.  Please read below for exclusions.
Our warranty excludes all consumable goods, eg. toner, ink cartridges,
                        bulbs, batteries, all As-Is items, missing accessories not stated
                        in our ad as pictured, any and all compatibility issues, etc.
                        Compatibility issues are not considered DOA. Please check with the
                        manufacturer
before purchasing
.

Damaged Shipments
If item arrives damaged by the carrier, please reject shipment and contact us immediately. If you do receive the package, submit clear images of the packaging/box and damaged item from multiple angles. DO NOT discard the packaging. Save packaging for carrier claim. Carrier will often come back to pick up the shipment. We cannot file a claim without the packaging and proper images. Thank you for your help and understanding.
Special Handling with Foam
High Value
items requiring special packaging will be foamed into the box. DO NOT lift up on the top plastic sheet or it'll make a mess. Lift foam out of box by grabbing 2nd plastic sheet from both sides.   If you accidentally peel the top plastic off, exposing the foam, just look for the next layer of plastic to lift the foam out cleanly.

Category: Medical

The generator supplies the hand piece with electrical energy and facilitates selection of power levels, system monitoring, and system diagnostics.
System utilizes ultrasonic energy to enable hemostatic cutting and/or coagulation of soft tissue.
Vibrate longitudinally at 55.5 kilohertz - This ultrasonic vibration at the blade enhances its cutting ability
The Harmonic Generator 300 System is indicated for soft tissue incisions when bleeding control and minimal thermal injury are desired.
The Harmonic Generator 300 System instruments can be used as an adjunct to or substitute for electrosurgery, lasers, and steel scalpels.
Shipping out of the lower 48 United States is available at
an additional cost. Seller is an authorized used medical equipment dealer. Shore
Medical Equipment has been developed with integrity, diligence, cost
containment and quality products. These efforts have led to high customer
satisfaction for the past 25 years. Our commitment to our customers is what
sets us apart from other pre-owned medical equipment and service companies. EBay

30-Day DOA Warranty
This product carries a  30-Day DOA Warranty
.
DOA stands for Dead On Arrival, meaning that the
                        item did not function properly when it arrived. You may return
                        for a replacement when available, or a refund
                        of the item price within 30
                        days of receipt. Shipping and handling
                        fees are
                        non-refundable as they are paid to a 3rd party.
                        This is the only way we can keep selling at such low rates. Customer is
                        responsible for all shipping costs and the item's safe arrival at
                        our facility.
If
                        you
                        receive a DOA product, please contact us for a
Return Authorization #
. All items
                        must be returned in the exact condition received,
                        including any
                        accessories & original packaging when applicable. Please contact us
                        by sending a message through eBay or calling.  Please read below for exclusions.
Our warranty excludes all consumable goods, eg. toner, ink cartridges,
                        bulbs, batteries, all As-Is items, missing accessories not stated
                        in our ad as pictured, any and all compatibility issues, etc.
                        Compatibility issues are not considered DOA. Please check with the
                        manufacturer
before purchasing
.

Damaged Shipments

If you do receive the package, submit clear images of the packaging/box and damaged item from multiple angles. DO NOT discard the packaging. Save packaging for carrier claim. Carrier will often come back to pick up the shipment. We cannot file a claim without the packaging and proper images. Thank you for your help and understanding.
Special Handling with Foam
High Value
items requiring special packaging will be foamed into the box. DO NOT lift up on the top plastic sheet or it'll make a mess. Lift foam out of box by grabbing 2nd plastic sheet from both sides.   If you accidentally peel the top plastic off, exposing the foam, just look for the next layer of plastic to lift the foam out cleanly.

This equipment is offered with our as-represented guarantee. For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Cosmetics:
Picturesare of the actual items. Item has been reprocessed and sterilized.Has somelight marks but overall, very clean and in great condition. Sealed in a sterile bag.PleaseReference Pictures for Cosmetics
Taken from the Internet:
These reusable ligating clip appliers, compatible with our non-absorbable clips, are designed for the ligation of tubular structures for open or endoscopic procedures. Simple to use, just position the ligating clip around the structure and apply pressure to the handle for our LX devices. Our patented lateral and transverse grooves on the inner clip surface provide excellent on-vessel clip security.
Applier and clips  on-vessel clip security for confident ligation. Instrument has patented lateral and transverse grooves to secure clips.
Long, thin, angled jaws  providing excellent visibility beyond structures and outstanding access.
Distal-tip closing  enables control and precise placement. Smooth, tumbled tip reduces trauma to vessels.
Mechanical Stop  limits maximum force.
Product Code: LC410
Length: 10 1/2"
Handle Color: Yellow
Clip Size: Large
Policies & Definitions:
Shipping
Most items ship out within
1-2 BUSINESS
daysafter the payment clears. We allow local pick up. Handling fee of $9.99 and CA tax will apply. We combine shipping to save you money if the items can be combined and shipped safely. We offer a combined shipping discount of $3 for each additional item purchased.
Free shipping offers do NOT apply to Puerto Rico, Alaska, Hawaii andinternational transactions
Definitions:
GUARANTEED WORKING MEANS
:
Theitem is guaranteed workingas long as we receive it back within14 days from the purchase date. We will replace the item at no additional cost if the item is DOA. If replacement is Not available, we will refund the purchase price. Please bid accordingly
AS-IS MEANS:
The item is sold AS-IS Where is. This means that the buyer acknowledges that the item may or may Not be working and that the item may or may Not be complete and the buyer is willing to accept the risk. Please bid accordingly
Shipping and handlingcost is Not refundable under any circumstancesand the buyer is responsible for any additional shipping cost. please bid accordingly.
Return Policy
Every item we sell is carefully inspected before it is shipped and is tested to the best of our ability. If merchandise is Not as described please keep all packing materials, brochures, paperwork, etc. and contact us immediately after your package arrives for a return authorization claim number or to file a claim with the carrier on your behalf. * All claims MUST be made within 3 days of receipt of order *Shipping charges will not be refunded * Non-defective returned items are subject to a 30% restocking fee.

"The sale ofSome medical equipmentmay be subject to regulation by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and state and local regulatory agencies. If the item is subject to FDA regulation, Imight verify your status as an authorized purchaser of this item before shipping of the item."

PAYMENT
Payment accepted through PayPal, credit card & wire
transfer. Payment
MUST
be made 48 hours after the listing ends. If you have a problem with
this, contact us
BEFORE
bidding. If payment has not been received or no contact has been made,
we reserve the right to re-list the item and the purchaser will no
longer have the right to purchase the item. Any non-paying eBay member
will be blocked and will no longer be able to bid on any of our items. Any buyer who wishes to pay via Credit Card directly to our company may do so by contacting your seller to obtain a Credit Card Authorization Form. All Credit Card Transactions will have a 3% Credit Card Processing Fee Added. All items sold in Virginia will have a 5.3% Virginia sales tax added to the final price.
The sales tax will not be applied to shipping and handling. This tax is
due to recent changes made by PayPal and eBay requiring that taxes be
payed by sellers that sell $20,000+ or 200+ items per year. We are
sorry for any inconvenience.
SHIPPING
Shipping costs are calculated based on varying locations.
Items may be shipped via USPS, UPS or FedEX. Item will not necessarily
be shipped as stated in the auction. Shipping carrier is at the sellers
discretion, unless the buyer specifies that they would like to use
their own account to ship their items. Items can be shipped on the
buyers DHL account but the buyer must create the label and e-mail it to
us, along with scheduling the pick-up of their item by DHL.
Our pick-up days for shipments are Tuesday and Friday on a weekly
basis, with the exception of holidays. In the event that Tuesday or
Friday is a holiday, items will ship out the following business day.
For freight items, exceptions will be made to allow for trucking
companies and their schedules.
All items
MUST
be
shipped with insurance. eBay does not offer this service anymore but
because of the delicacy and value of most of our items, we must insure
them when shipping. The insurance cost will be a flat $3.00 fee for
ALL
items sold within the
US and a flat $5.00 fee for
ALL
items sold
internationally.
Please email us for any international shipping quotes. We reserve the
right to not ship certain items to a specific country for any reason.
Large or particularly heavy items will
NOT
be shipped
internationally unless the purchaser agrees to the shipping charges and
insurance fees before the end of the auction.
All international freight shipping must be arranged by the purchaser.
We will prepare all freight items for shipment including but not
limited to: palletizing, bubble wrap and crating (extra fee).
TERMS
This item is guaranteed to power on and function as pictured and
described above
ONLY
.
We make every effort to describe each item as best as we can and it is
your responsibility to read the auction in its entirety. Ask any
questions before you bid.
Returns and/or refunds will only be accepted if the item is damaged in
shipping and insurance was purchased or if the item is clearly not
described correctly and the tamper sticker has not been damaged or
adjusted. If damaged in shipping, please keep box and all packaging and
contact us so we can file a claim with the carrier. We will not accept
returns for any other reason.
Consumables (i.e. batteries, lights) are not guaranteed.
The equipment we sell is
USED
can and may have scratches, chips, cracks, blemishes or markings on the
unit from the previous owner.
Please know what it is and how to use the equipment
BEFORE
you bid on it.

Note:

STATEMENT
We cannot and will not ship goods to the following Countries - Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Libya, North Korea, Sudan, UNITA (Angola), Afghanistan, Belarus, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Burma, Haiti, Indonesia, Kosovo, Liberia, Macedonia, Nigeria, Rwanda, Slovenia, Somalia, Syria, Vietnam, Yemen, Democratic Republic of the Congo (formerly Zaire), Zimbabwe.
POLICY
This equipment is offered with our as-represented guarantee. For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).
DISCLAIMER
Regardless of the origin of the equipment, documentation provided or identification appearing upon the equipment, the equipment described and offered here is in no way certified for, recommended for, or offered for any specific use. The purchaser agrees that the seller shall not be held responsible or liable for any injuries or damages, whether incidental or consequential, associated in any way with the equipment. The purchaser, by bidding on this equipment, indicates their acknowledgment of, and agreement to the terms of this disclaimer.

DESCRIPTION

Ethicon Endo-Surgery Harmonic Scalpel Handpiece - FOR PARTS -

ALL
items are sold as
is, where is with no warranty expressed or implied.
Unit may show signs of wear and tear, use, sticker residue, scratches,
writing, etc.
Auction does not include any other cords, cables or accessories other

PAYMENT
Payment accepted through PayPal, credit card & wire
transfer. Payment
MUST
be made 48 hours after the listing ends. If you have a problem with
this, contact us
BEFORE
bidding. If payment has not been received or no contact has been made,
we reserve the right to re-list the item and the purchaser will no
longer have the right to purchase the item. Any non-paying eBay member
will be blocked and will no longer be able to bid on any of our items. Any buyer who wishes to pay via Credit Card directly to our company may do so by contacting your seller to obtain a Credit Card Authorization Form. All Credit Card Transactions will have a 3% Credit Card Processing Fee Added. All items sold in Virginia will have a 5.3% Virginia sales tax added to the final price.
The sales tax will not be applied to shipping and handling. This tax is
due to recent changes made by PayPal and eBay requiring that taxes be
payed by sellers that sell $20,000+ or 200+ items per year. We are
sorry for any inconvenience.
SHIPPING
Shipping costs are calculated based on varying locations.
Items may be shipped via USPS, UPS or FedEX. Item will not necessarily
be shipped as stated in the auction. Shipping carrier is at the sellers
discretion, unless the buyer specifies that they would like to use
their own account to ship their items. Items can be shipped on the
buyers DHL account but the buyer must create the label and e-mail it to
us, along with scheduling the pick-up of their item by DHL.
Our pick-up days for shipments are Tuesday and Friday on a weekly
basis, with the exception of holidays. In the event that Tuesday or
Friday is a holiday, items will ship out the following business day.
For freight items, exceptions will be made to allow for trucking
companies and their schedules.
All items
MUST
be
shipped with insurance. eBay does not offer this service anymore but
because of the delicacy and value of most of our items, we must insure
them when shipping. The insurance cost will be a flat $3.00 fee for
ALL
items sold within the
US and a flat $5.00 fee for
ALL
items sold
internationally.
Please email us for any international shipping quotes. We reserve the
right to not ship certain items to a specific country for any reason.
Large or particularly heavy items will
NOT
be shipped
internationally unless the purchaser agrees to the shipping charges and
insurance fees before the end of the auction.
All international freight shipping must be arranged by the purchaser.
We will prepare all freight items for shipment including but not
limited to: palletizing, bubble wrap and crating (extra fee).
TERMS
This item is guaranteed to power on and function as pictured and
described above
ONLY
.
We make every effort to describe each item as best as we can and it is
your responsibility to read the auction in its entirety. Ask any
questions before you bid.
Returns and/or refunds will only be accepted if the item is damaged in
shipping and insurance was purchased or if the item is clearly not
described correctly and the tamper sticker has not been damaged or
adjusted. If damaged in shipping, please keep box and all packaging and
contact us so we can file a claim with the carrier. We will not accept
returns for any other reason.
Consumables (i.e. batteries, lights) are not guaranteed.
The equipment we sell is
USED
can and may have scratches, chips, cracks, blemishes or markings on the
unit from the previous owner.
Please know what it is and how to use the equipment
BEFORE
you bid on it.

Payment
Payment Options:

Paypal: We accept Paypal payment for items up to and including $2000. Any items selling for greater than $2000 will require an alternative payment method.
2.
Direct Credit Card payment to us over the phone. We accept Visa, Master Card, Discover, and American Express. Please call us at 720-330-9307 if you would like to pay for an item with a credit card. Credit cards are excepted for items in the amount of $2,000 or less.
3.
Business check or direct wire. We are happy to accept checks and wires, if you would like to pay with check or wire please email or call us and we will provide mailing address or wire information. Office: 720-330-9307

STATEMENT
We cannot and will not ship goods to the following Countries - Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Libya, North Korea, Sudan, UNITA (Angola), Afghanistan, Belarus, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Burma, Haiti, Indonesia, Kosovo, Liberia, Macedonia, Nigeria, Rwanda, Slovenia, Somalia, Syria, Vietnam, Yemen, Democratic Republic of the Congo (formerly Zaire), Zimbabwe.
POLICY
This equipment is offered with our as-represented guarantee. For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).
DISCLAIMER
Regardless of the origin of the equipment, documentation provided or identification appearing upon the equipment, the equipment described and offered here is in no way certified for, recommended for, or offered for any specific use. The purchaser agrees that the seller shall not be held responsible or liable for any injuries or damages, whether incidental or consequential, associated in any way with the equipment. The purchaser, by bidding on this equipment, indicates their acknowledgment of, and agreement to the terms of this disclaimer.

For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. eBay
policy.
Refunds
Refunds will be issued within 14 business days after the receipt of the equipment.All returned items must be in original condition, packaging, sealed and unused, tamper tag must be intact. We reserve the right to reject the item after inspection, (items with physical damage or incomplete packaging, incomplete items).In the event that physical damage is caused during transit of a return, it is the customers responsibility to contact the carrier to start a damage claim upon receiving a notification from us.The responsibility is between the customer and the carrier.
Items being sold as "For Parts Only" are sold as final sale. No returns will be accepted.
S
hipping Terms
Items ship within 1-2 business days after payment is received.Items will not ship on Saturday and Sunday.Orders will be shipped by the most cost effective channel.All items are packaged and shipped in a professional manner.The tracking number will be sent to you.Combined shipping discounts are available for multiple item purchases.
Flat rate fees are for Continental US shipping ONLY.Alaska, Hawaii and all other NON Contiguous Territories are extra cost.
We will ship International; Please note that Customers/Buyers are responsible for any customs duties, taxes, tariffs or any other charges as such on items being shipped to a foreign country.If the item is shipped to a U.S. exporter, once it is received by the exporter we are no longer responsible for the item.
All freight items are shipped within the continental U.S only.All international freight purchases are shipped to a
U.S. exporter only

Shipping for returned items that are not defective is the responsibility of the buyer.
We ship exactly as described in auction. If manuals, software, packaging etc. are not mentioned, they are not included.
Returned items must be in the same condition as they were shipped.
SHIPPING
We ship 1-2 business days after cleared payment (excluding holidays and weekends)
Shipping is via our choice ofUPS Ground or USPS Priority Mail
If you need a different method of s
hipping please contact us before auction ends
and we will do our best to accommodate you.
INTERNATIONAL BUYERS
We ship internationally on a case by case basis. If you are an international buyer please contact us before buying or bidding on any of our items. We will not ship internationally unless we are contacted first.
Import duties, taxes, and charges are not included in the item price or shipping cost. These charges are the buyer's responsibility. Please check with your country's customs office to determine what these additional costs will be prior to bidding or buying.

STATEMENT

POLICY
This equipment is offered with our as-represented guarantee. For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).

Description: 
Ethicon HAR36 Harmonic Ace 36 Laparoscopic Shears - Individual
Overview
Ethicon HAR36 Harmonic Ace 36 Laparoscopic Shears
Individual Shaft Diameter:
5mm Length: 36CM
Here is what Ethicon has to say about Harmonic Ace Shears:
Precision, multifunctionality & minimal thermal tissue injury. This is design refined by experience. Input from hundreds of surgeons and continual refinements over the years have produced a surgical device with versatility and precision.
The HARMONIC ACE Curved Shears for both your laparoscopic and open procedures are:
Precise - minimal lateral thermal tissue damage for safer dissection near vital structures. Efficient - move through tissue quickly while maintaining haemostasis. Versatile - precisely cut, coagulate, grasp, and dissect - without instrument exchanges. Reliable - seal vessels up to 5mm as well as lymphatics.
Ergonomic - enjoy a comfortable grip, with handle and hook trigger for balance and control. Shaft Diameter: 5mm Length: 36CM
Compatible with HP054
Specialties Urogoly Colorectal Bariatric General Surgery

if payment arrives by 3pm CST.
We ship via FedEx Ground w/detailed tracking (contact us for overnight shipping).
Items will arrive within 1-4 business days, depending on location.
Most orders shipping to IA, IN, IL, MI, or WI will arrive the next day.
We will combine shipping
for multiple purchases.
If purchasing multiple listings, please wait to pay until we send a combined invoice.
There will be a 7.75% sales tax added for items shipped within the state of Illinois.
We accept PayPal - or you may call us and pay via credit card at 888-416-2409.
We offer a
30 day money-back guarantee
on every item we sell.
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us. You can send a message via eBay or call us at 888-416-2409.

STATEMENT
We cannot and will not ship goods to the following Countries - Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Libya, North Korea, Sudan, UNITA (Angola), Afghanistan, Belarus, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Burma, Haiti, Indonesia, Kosovo, Liberia, Macedonia, Nigeria, Rwanda, Slovenia, Somalia, Syria, Vietnam, Yemen, Democratic Republic of the Congo (formerly Zaire), Zimbabwe.
POLICY
This equipment is offered with our as-represented guarantee. For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).
DISCLAIMER
Regardless of the origin of the equipment, documentation provided or identification appearing upon the equipment, the equipment described and offered here is in no way certified for, recommended for, or offered for any specific use. The purchaser agrees that the seller shall not be held responsible or liable for any injuries or damages, whether incidental or consequential, associated in any way with the equipment. The purchaser, by bidding on this equipment, indicates their acknowledgment of, and agreement to the terms of this disclaimer.
EBAY RULES
"The sale of this item may be subject to regulation by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and state and local regulatory agencies. If so, do not bid on this item unless you are an authorized purchaser. If the item is subject to FDA regulation, I will verify your status as an authorized purchaser of this item before shipping of the item." If you have questions about legal obligations regarding sales of medical devices, you should consult with the FDA's Center for Devices and Radiological Health:
tools4docs
http://www.fda.gov/cdrh/devadvice/
http://www.fda.gov/cdrh/industry/support/
Phone number: 800.638.2041
This equipment has been properly Cleaned and or Sterilized (where required). Furthermore, this equipment does Not require a prescription from a doctor, dentist, optometrist, or veterinarian. Unless otherwise stated, all goods sold have been either opened or have been previously used.
Tools4Docs is an Exporters and Re-Seller of Medical Equipment located in Tampa, Florida and can be reached by calling (813) 699-4048.
Shipping :
All goods are shipped as soon as payment is received utilizing UPS, FedEx, USPS or DHL and is strictly to our discretion unless other prior arrangement have been made and agreed upon by and between the buyer and us (The seller).
A tracking number will be emailed to you as soon as it is available.
If shipping address is unconfirmed by PayPal, you will need to pay for insurance.
International Customers, please be advised that you are Responsible for:
a) Determining if these types of goods are allowed to be imported into your country and if required, that you have all necessary permits, Etc
b) Paying for Customs duties, taxes, Etc.
Payment :
Please DON'T take your time paying for your goods because it only delays the packing and shipping process.
We accept All forms of PayPal payments from customers with CONFIRMED shipping addresses ONLY ! otherwise, you will need to arrange for alternative method of payment with us for which you will receive a discount on top of the final purchase price. These alternative payment methods are secure as demonstrated by our
Feedback
however, if
Feedback
is not enough and you have your own requirements that you would like us to fulfill, please let us know and we will do our best to accommodate you.

Image URLs: 
Description: 
Here is an
Vintage Surgical Suture
in its original foil packet, unopened. Perhaps this was for a first aid kit, or a military kit? Couldn't find much about it on the Internet. Here is what the packet says "1666 Ethicon., Non-Boilable, 5-0 Ethilon, Cutting PS-2, 10 inches, Sterile, Nonabsorbable Surgical Suture U.S.P. Type B Brand" and it has a picture of a curved needle (?). See the pics for the details. I hope someone is interested in this great vintage medical supply.

30-Day DOA Warranty
This product carries a  30-Day DOA Warranty
.
DOA stands for Dead On Arrival, meaning that the
                        item did not function properly when it arrived. You may return
                        for a replacement when available, or a refund
                        of the item price within 30
                        days of receipt. Shipping and handling
                        fees are
                        non-refundable as they are paid to a 3rd party.
                        This is the only way we can keep selling at such low rates. Customer is
                        responsible for all shipping costs and the item's safe arrival at
                        our facility.
If
                        you
                        receive a DOA product, please contact us for a
Return Authorization #
. All items
                        must be returned in the exact condition received,
                        including any
                        accessories & original packaging when applicable. Please contact us
                        by sending a message through eBay or calling.  Please read below for exclusions.
Our warranty excludes all consumable goods, eg. toner, ink cartridges,
                        bulbs, batteries, all As-Is items, missing accessories not stated
                        in our ad as pictured, any and all compatibility issues, etc.
                        Compatibility issues are not considered DOA. Please check with the
                        manufacturer
before purchasing
.

                        preparation for carrier pick-up, a requirement for all carriers.

Damaged Shipments
If item arrives damaged by the carrier, please reject shipment and contact us immediately. If you do receive the package, submit clear images of the packaging/box and damaged item from multiple angles. DO NOT discard the packaging. Save packaging for carrier claim. Carrier will often come back to pick up the shipment. We cannot file a claim without the packaging and proper images. Thank you for your help and understanding.
Special Handling with Foam
High Value
items requiring special packaging will be foamed into the box. DO NOT lift up on the top plastic sheet or it'll make a mess. Lift foam out of box by grabbing 2nd plastic sheet from both sides.   If you accidentally peel the top plastic off, exposing the foam, just look for the next layer of plastic to lift the foam out cleanly.

STATEMENT
We cannot and will not ship goods to the following Countries - Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Libya, North Korea, Sudan, UNITA (Angola), Afghanistan, Belarus, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Burma, Haiti, Indonesia, Kosovo, Liberia, Macedonia, Nigeria, Rwanda, Slovenia, Somalia, Syria, Vietnam, Yemen, Democratic Republic of the Congo (formerly Zaire), Zimbabwe.
POLICY
This equipment is offered with our as-represented guarantee. For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).

For over 23 years, Ganim Medical has been helping our customers succeed, day in and day out. Weve developed strong, solid relationships with our customers through our unparalleled customer support, providing them with equipment as well as a time-saving resource for needed information.
In addition to over 160 lines of new products and 80,000 sq. ft. of warehouse space full of previously owned equipment, Ganim Medical offers a wide array of services to help save you time and money. Call us today to find out how we can help your facility!
Additional Services Offered:
Liquidation Services
Whether you need to sell one piece, or an entire facility, Ganim Medical has the resources and contacts to liquidate your equipment quickly and get you the cash you need.
Consignment Services
If you have equipment which is no longer in use and is taking up valuable space, Ganim Medical can pick up your unwanted items and sell them for you on a consignment basis. Our rates are the lowest in the industry and this truly is the best way to get the most money for your items.
Surplus Asset Management (SAM) Program
This is Ganim Medicals Signature Program! We handle all of your surplus equipment needs, from inventory and tracking, to pick-up, storage, and sale. This extremely flexible program can be custom-fit to your specific needs, so call today to schedule your SAM Program presentation.
ASC Equipment Planning Services

POLICY
This equipment is offered with our as-represented guarantee. For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).

MED Online Policy:
Guarantee / Return:
Full 14 Day Money Back Guarantee Terms:
If you are not satisfied with your purchase you may return the item(s) for a full money back refund on the purchased item(s) within 14-days of delivery. To qualify for a full refund (item(s) only, shipping is not refundable), buyer must pay return shipping with tracking and insurance, ship with the same form of transportation it was delivered with, and have item(s) returned in the same condition as well as in the same packaging as they were originally received with. Warranty stickers on returned item(s) must be clearly in tact. Also, tracking must be provided through eBay, proving the item(s) are shipped back within 14-days of receiving the item(s).
Shipping:
Shipments are through Van Lines Transportation, Freight Transportation, or you may arrange local pickup at our commercially zoned dock. Shipping charges are applied to the invoice at cost plus a $35 preparation fee if shipping via Freight to cover time & materials for strapping it to a pallet. No fee for Van Lines unless it needs to be strapped to a pallet. Feel free to ask for a shipping quote before buying this item. We will not ship internationally unless there is prior, written approval from Garret Purrington. If you need this item crated - contact us for a specific crate-quote.
The following details are required in order to determine the cost of shipping:
Is the delivery to a commercially zoned or residentially zoned address?
Will the delivery be to a loading dock and/or will you have a fork lift to remove the item from the truck?
Is the delivery address tractor trailer accessible?

Guarantee / Return:
Full 14 Day Money Back Guarantee Terms:
If you are not satisfied with your purchase you may return the item(s) for a full money back refund on the purchased item(s) within 14-days of delivery. To qualify for a full refund (item(s) only, shipping is not refundable), buyer must pay return shipping with tracking and insurance, ship with the same form of transportation it was delivered with, and have item(s) returned in the same condition as well as in the same packaging as they were originally received with. Warranty stickers on returned item(s) must be clearly in tact. Also, tracking must be provided through eBay, proving the item(s) are shipped back within 14-days of receiving the item(s).
Shipping:
Shipments are through Van Lines Transportation, Freight Transportation, or you may arrange local pickup at our commercially zoned dock. Shipping charges are applied to the invoice at cost plus a $35 preparation fee if shipping via Freight to cover time & materials for strapping it to a pallet. No fee for Van Lines unless it needs to be strapped to a pallet. Feel free to ask for a shipping quote before buying this item. We will not ship internationally unless there is prior, written approval from Garret Purrington. If you need this item crated - contact us for a specific crate-quote.

Description: 
Ethicon Ultracision G300 Generator Harmonic Scalpel Cart
What you see here today is a Cart that is maily used with the Ehticon Ultracision G300 Generators and Harmonic Scalpel Units. It is in excellent overall condition with some sings of normal wear. It is a very sturdy cart that rolls easy and is a great suitor for transporting and supporting very sensitive medical equipment. It was made by Johnson & Johnson, features 2 angled shelves to avoid data/manuals/charts from slipping or sliding off! It also has a very nice drawer that easily slides out from two sides of the cart and a easy to push/move handles on both sides of the cart. The 4 roller wheels make the cart easy to move from any direction and ensure stable movement. This is a very nice cart
Specifics:
Ethicon Endo-Surgery
Reference: CRT 01
Sturdy Plastic & Aluminum Design
Easy To Use & Move
(4) 4'' Swivel Roller Wheels
(2) Angled Shelves 9.5'' deep x 13'' Wide - Max Rated Weight: 3.0 KG
(1) Bottom Shelf 13'' deep x 13'' Wide - Max Rated Weight: 6.0 KG
(1) Drawer 13.1'' Deep x 11.4'' Wide - Max Rated Weight: 3.0 KG
(2) Handles
Top Platform Dimensions: 14.5'' Wide x 14.1'' Long with "5" Bolts for mounting equipment
CONDITION
This cart is in overall excellent condition with normal signs of use. It has a couple scratches on the bottom near one of the wheels as it has probually been bumped in transport. All of the wheels function correctly and move flawlessly. The drawer moves out of both sides with no issues whatsoever. The color of the cart does not have any defects. Overall this is a very nice and sturdy cart

Equipment Ratings
Each item in our warehouse is rated on a 1-5 scale when it is checked into inventory. If an item needs minor repairs which we plan to do prior to sale, it is rated based on its repaired condition.
Rating
Function
Cosmetics
1-New
Good
New in Box
2-Excellent
Good
Only minor blemishes if any
3-Good
Good
Shows normal wear for age
4-Fair
Good
Notable flaws (ie cracks or dents in casing, missing trim pieces, poor paint, etc)
5-Poor
Parts Unit
Unit may have significant damage

POLICY
This equipment is offered with our as-represented guarantee. For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).

Regardless of the origin of the equipment, documentation provided or identification appearing upon the equipment, the equipment described and offered here is in no way certified for, recommended for, or offered for any specific use. your package leaves our facility we have no control over courier delays.

please contact us so we may assist you in tracking and or solving the issue
with the courier prior to leaving negative feedback or filing a complaint or
claim.

Taken from the Internet:
These reusable ligating clip appliers, compatible with our non-absorbable clips, are designed for the ligation of tubular structures for open or endoscopic procedures. Simple to use, just position the ligating clip around the structure and apply pressure to the handle for our LX devices. Our patented lateral and transverse grooves on the inner clip surface provide excellent on-vessel clip security.
Applier and clips  on-vessel clip security for confident ligation. Instrument has patented lateral and transverse grooves to secure clips.
Long, thin, angled jaws  providing excellent visibility beyond structures and outstanding access.
Distal-tip closing  enables control and precise placement. Smooth, tumbled tip reduces trauma to vessels.
Mechanical Stop  limits maximum force.
Product Code: LX207
Length:7 1/2"
Handle Color: Silver
Clip Size: Medium
Policies & Definitions:
Shipping
Most items ship out within
1-2 BUSINESS
daysafter the payment clears. We allow local pick up. Handling fee of $9.99 and CA tax will apply. We combine shipping to save you money if the items can be combined and shipped safely. We offer a combined shipping discount of $3 for each additional item purchased.
Free shipping offers do NOT apply to Puerto Rico, Alaska, Hawaii andinternational transactions
Definitions:
GUARANTEED WORKING MEANS
:
Theitem is guaranteed workingas long as we receive it back within14 days from the purchase date. We will replace the item at no additional cost if the item is DOA. If replacement is Not available, we will refund the purchase price. Please bid accordingly
AS-IS MEANS:
The item is sold AS-IS Where is. This means that the buyer acknowledges that the item may or may Not be working and that the item may or may Not be complete and the buyer is willing to accept the risk. Please bid accordingly
Shipping and handlingcost is Not refundable under any circumstancesand the buyer is responsible for any additional shipping cost. please bid accordingly.

If merchandise is Not as described please keep all packing materials, brochures, paperwork, etc. and contact us immediately after your package arrives for a return authorization claim number or to file a claim with the carrier on your behalf. * All claims MUST be made within 3 days of receipt of order *Shipping charges will not be refunded * Non-defective returned items are subject to a 30% restocking fee.

Taken from the Internet:
These reusable ligating clip appliers, compatible with our non-absorbable clips, are designed for the ligation of tubular structures for open or endoscopic procedures. Simple to use, just position the ligating clip around the structure and apply pressure to the handle for our LX devices. Our patented lateral and transverse grooves on the inner clip surface provide excellent on-vessel clip security.
Applier and clips  on-vessel clip security for confident ligation. Instrument has patented lateral and transverse grooves to secure clips.
Long, thin, angled jaws  providing excellent visibility beyond structures and outstanding access.
Distal-tip closing  enables control and precise placement. Smooth, tumbled tip reduces trauma to vessels.
Mechanical Stop  limits maximum force.
Product Code: LC310
Length: 10 1/2"
Handle Color: Green
Clip Size: Medium/Large

PAYMENT
Payment accepted through PayPal, credit card & wire
 transfer. Payment
MUST
be made 48 hours after the listing ends. If you have a problem with
 this, contact us
BEFORE
bidding. If payment has not been received or no contact has been made,
we reserve the right to re-list the item and the purchaser will no
 longer have the right to purchase the item. Any non-paying eBay member
 will be blocked and will no longer be able to bid on any of our items. Any buyer who wishes to pay via Credit Card directly to our company may do so by contacting your seller to obtain a Credit Card Authorization Form. All Credit Card Transactions will have a 3% Credit Card Processing Fee Added. All items sold in Virginia will have a 5.3% Virginia sales tax added to the final price.
 The sales tax will not be applied to shipping and handling. This tax is
 due to recent changes made by PayPal and eBay requiring that taxes be
 payed by sellers that sell $20,000+ or 200+ items per year. We are
 sorry for any inconvenience.
SHIPPING
Shipping costs are calculated based on varying locations.
Items may be shipped via USPS, UPS or FedEX. Item will not necessarily
 be shipped as stated in the auction. Shipping carrier is at the sellers
 discretion, unless the buyer specifies that they would like to use
 their own account to ship their items. Items can be shipped on the
 buyers DHL account but the buyer must create the label and e-mail it to
 us, along with scheduling the pick-up of their item by DHL.
Our pick-up days for shipments are Tuesday and Friday on a weekly
 basis, with the exception of holidays. In the event that Tuesday or
 Friday is a holiday, items will ship out the following business day.
 For freight items, exceptions will be made to allow for trucking
 companies and their schedules.
All items
MUST
be
 shipped with insurance. eBay does not offer this service anymore but
 because of the delicacy and value of most of our items, we must insure
 them when shipping. The insurance cost will be a flat $3.00 fee for
ALL
items sold within the
 US and a flat $5.00 fee for
ALL
items sold
 internationally.
Please email us for any international shipping quotes. We reserve the
 right to not ship certain items to a specific country for any reason.
 Large or particularly heavy items will
NOT
be shipped
internationally unless the purchaser agrees to the shipping charges and
 insurance fees before the end of the auction.
All international freight shipping must be arranged by the purchaser.
 We will prepare all freight items for shipment including but not
 limited to: palletizing, bubble wrap and crating (extra fee).
TERMS
This item is guaranteed to power on and function as pictured and
 described above
ONLY
.
We make every effort to describe each item as best as we can and it is
 your responsibility to read the auction in its entirety. Ask any
 questions before you bid.
Returns and/or refunds will only be accepted if the item is damaged in
 shipping and insurance was purchased or if the item is clearly not
 described correctly and the tamper sticker has not been damaged or
 adjusted. If damaged in shipping, please keep box and all packaging and
contact us so we can file a claim with the carrier. We will not accept
 returns for any other reason.
Consumables (i.e. batteries, lights) are not guaranteed.
The equipment we sell is
USED
can and may have scratches, chips, cracks, blemishes or markings on the
 unit from the previous owner.
Please know what it is and how to use the equipment
BEFORE
you bid on it.

 the sticker is broken, tampered with or missing, absolutely
NO REFUND
will be accepted. The sticker number may not be

PAYMENT
Payment accepted through PayPal, credit card & wire
 transfer. Payment
MUST
be made 48 hours after the listing ends. If you have a problem with
 this, contact us
BEFORE
bidding. If payment has not been received or no contact has been made,
we reserve the right to re-list the item and the purchaser will no
 longer have the right to purchase the item. Any non-paying eBay member
 will be blocked and will no longer be able to bid on any of our items. Any buyer who wishes to pay via Credit Card directly to our company may do so by contacting your seller to obtain a Credit Card Authorization Form. All Credit Card Transactions will have a 3% Credit Card Processing Fee Added. All items sold in Virginia will have a 5.3% Virginia sales tax added to the final price.
 The sales tax will not be applied to shipping and handling. This tax is
 due to recent changes made by PayPal and eBay requiring that taxes be
 payed by sellers that sell $20,000+ or 200+ items per year. We are
 sorry for any inconvenience.
SHIPPING
Shipping costs are calculated based on varying locations.
Items may be shipped via USPS, UPS or FedEX. Item will not necessarily
 be shipped as stated in the auction. Shipping carrier is at the sellers
 discretion, unless the buyer specifies that they would like to use
 their own account to ship their items. Items can be shipped on the
 buyers DHL account but the buyer must create the label and e-mail it to
 us, along with scheduling the pick-up of their item by DHL.
Our pick-up days for shipments are Tuesday and Friday on a weekly
 basis, with the exception of holidays. In the event that Tuesday or
 Friday is a holiday, items will ship out the following business day.
 For freight items, exceptions will be made to allow for trucking
 companies and their schedules.
All items
MUST
be
 shipped with insurance. eBay does not offer this service anymore but
 because of the delicacy and value of most of our items, we must insure
 them when shipping. The insurance cost will be a flat $3.00 fee for
ALL
items sold within the
 US and a flat $5.00 fee for
ALL
items sold
 internationally.
Please email us for any international shipping quotes. We reserve the
 right to not ship certain items to a specific country for any reason.
 Large or particularly heavy items will
NOT
be shipped
internationally unless the purchaser agrees to the shipping charges and
 insurance fees before the end of the auction.
All international freight shipping must be arranged by the purchaser.
 We will prepare all freight items for shipment including but not
 limited to: palletizing, bubble wrap and crating (extra fee).
TERMS
This item is guaranteed to power on and function as pictured and
 described above
ONLY
.
We make every effort to describe each item as best as we can and it is
 your responsibility to read the auction in its entirety. Ask any
 questions before you bid.
Returns and/or refunds will only be accepted if the item is damaged in
 shipping and insurance was purchased or if the item is clearly not
 described correctly and the tamper sticker has not been damaged or
 adjusted. If damaged in shipping, please keep box and all packaging and
contact us so we can file a claim with the carrier. We will not accept
 returns for any other reason.
Consumables (i.e. batteries, lights) are not guaranteed.
The equipment we sell is
USED
can and may have scratches, chips, cracks, blemishes or markings on the
 unit from the previous owner.
Please know what it is and how to use the equipment
BEFORE
you bid on it.

For sale by JNM Trading & Consignment is a Lot of 2 10mm Endopath Babcock
.
Here is your chance to purchase for a fraction of retail
. There are more details on this item below. Feel free to contact us with any questions.
Specs:
Manufacture: Ethicon Endopath
Model#: 10BB
JNM Rating: 5
JNM Trading & Consignment's Rating System
5 = New
4 = Like New
3 = Good to Fair
2 = Has issue (read description)
1 = As-Is
Payment
Payment is due no later than 5 days after listing end. If payment is not received in specified time a non-paying bidders complaint will be filed. If non-paying bidders complaint is not resolved we will then leave negative feedback and restrict you from bidding with us in the future.
Feedback is reciprocal. Our feedback settings are automated. Once your payment is received feedback we will left. Please return the favor once you are satisfied with your purchase. If there is issue with an item please contact us before leaving negative feedback. We believe that the customer comes first and we go above and beyond to correct any issue that may occur. We look forward to making you a happy customer and your positive feedback.
About Us
We are a small family run trading and consignment company. We offer a market analysis on your product and then give you the option to sell or consign your item with us. My wife and I have sold on Ebay and other internet based website's for over 12 years. We have a large international customer base and several retail stores that we buy from and sell to. We like to believe that we can sell anything and there is no job or product to big. Let us sell your product and help you or your company grow. There is a large customer base out there just waiting to be reached and JnM is the company to reach them for you. Let JnM bring the world to you!
Shipping
We ship items through paypal. Please make sure that your shipping information is up to date!
Freight Shipments
To qualify for free shipping you must have loading dock and or forklift. Buyers without these will be subject to a lift gate charge.
Local Pick up
Local pick up is available for a fee of $2.00 for items under $100.00 and $5.00 for all items over $100.00. Our shipping rates and pick up fees are non-negotiable so please take that into consideration when bidding or purchasing.
International Shipping
Due to lost packages and charge backs we will only offer tracking with express mail shipping outside of the US and Canada. Buyer is responsible for broker fee and any others that may occur. If you choose priority shipping USPS doesn't always offer tracking for with service. All international packages will be insured.This will help in insuring you receive your item and if not we are protected.
Combined Shipping
We do discount shipping as long as items can be shipped together. If discount does not reflect in listing feel free to e-mail us for a corrected invoice. When you purchase more than 1 item from JNM Trading & Consignment we will discount shipping on each additional item 50%. Items must be able to be shipped together without the risk of damage. You will be charged 100% shipping for the most expensive item to ship you will then receive 50% off of shipping cost for each additional.
Policies
JnM Trading & Consignment is the consignee of most of the items we sell. We are merely a bailee acting on behalf of the seller to facilitate the sale of the goods by holding the goods until such time as a sale is completed and the goods are shipped to the buyer. JnM Trading & Consignment has used its best efforts to inspect the item(s) for sale and create descriptions and furnish photographs that fairly and adequately depict the type, condition and image of the goods at the time of sale.
JnM Trading & Consignment makes no express or implied warranties or representations regarding the condition or suitability of the goods and to the extent allowed by law, specifically disclaims any express or implied warranties, including but not limited to any warranty of merchantability or fitness for purpose. JnM Trading & Consignment reserves the right to cancel bids on any item for any reason.

MUST

BEFORE

 longer have the right to purchase the item. Any non-paying eBay member
 will be blocked and will no longer be able to bid on any of our items. Any buyer who wishes to pay via Credit Card directly to our company may do so by contacting your seller to obtain a Credit Card Authorization Form. All Credit Card Transactions will have a 3% Credit Card Processing Fee Added. All items sold in Virginia will have a 5.3% Virginia sales tax added to the final price.
 The sales tax will not be applied to shipping and handling. This tax is
 due to recent changes made by PayPal and eBay requiring that taxes be
 payed by sellers that sell $20,000+ or 200+ items per year. We are
 sorry for any inconvenience.
SHIPPING
Shipping costs are calculated based on varying locations.
Items may be shipped via USPS, UPS or FedEX. Item will not necessarily
 be shipped as stated in the auction. Shipping carrier is at the sellers
 discretion, unless the buyer specifies that they would like to use
 their own account to ship their items. Items can be shipped on the
 buyers DHL account but the buyer must create the label and e-mail it to
 us, along with scheduling the pick-up of their item by DHL.
Our pick-up days for shipments are Tuesday and Friday on a weekly
 basis, with the exception of holidays. In the event that Tuesday or
 Friday is a holiday, items will ship out the following business day.
 For freight items, exceptions will be made to allow for trucking
 companies and their schedules.
All items
MUST
be
 shipped with insurance. eBay does not offer this service anymore but
 because of the delicacy and value of most of our items, we must insure
 them when shipping. The insurance cost will be a flat $3.00 fee for
ALL
items sold within the
 US and a flat $5.00 fee for
ALL
items sold
 internationally.
Please email us for any international shipping quotes. We reserve the
 right to not ship certain items to a specific country for any reason.
 Large or particularly heavy items will
NOT
be shipped
internationally unless the purchaser agrees to the shipping charges and
 insurance fees before the end of the auction.
All international freight shipping must be arranged by the purchaser.
 We will prepare all freight items for shipment including but not
 limited to: palletizing, bubble wrap and crating (extra fee).

This item is guaranteed to power on and function as pictured and
 described above
ONLY
.
We make every effort to describe each item as best as we can and it is
 your responsibility to read the auction in its entirety. Ask any
 questions before you bid.
Returns and/or refunds will only be accepted if the item is damaged in
 shipping and insurance was purchased or if the item is clearly not
 described correctly and the tamper sticker has not been damaged or
 adjusted. If damaged in shipping, please keep box and all packaging and
contact us so we can file a claim with the carrier. We will not accept
 returns for any other reason.
Consumables (i.e. batteries, lights) are not guaranteed.
The equipment we sell is
USED
can and may have scratches, chips, cracks, blemishes or markings on the
 unit from the previous owner.
Please know what it is and how to use the equipment
BEFORE
you bid on it.

Any buyer who wishes to pay via Credit Card directly to our company may do so by contacting your seller to obtain a Credit Card Authorization Form. All Credit Card Transactions will have a 3% Credit Card Processing Fee Added. All items sold in Virginia will have a 5.3% Virginia sales tax added to the final price.
 The sales tax will not be applied to shipping and handling. This tax is
 due to recent changes made by PayPal and eBay requiring that taxes be
 payed by sellers that sell $20,000+ or 200+ items per year. We are
 sorry for any inconvenience.
SHIPPING
Shipping costs are calculated based on varying locations.
Items may be shipped via USPS, UPS or FedEX. Item will not necessarily
 be shipped as stated in the auction. Shipping carrier is at the sellers
 discretion, unless the buyer specifies that they would like to use
 their own account to ship their items. Items can be shipped on the
 buyers DHL account but the buyer must create the label and e-mail it to
 us, along with scheduling the pick-up of their item by DHL.
Our pick-up days for shipments are Tuesday and Friday on a weekly
 basis, with the exception of holidays. In the event that Tuesday or
 Friday is a holiday, items will ship out the following business day.
 For freight items, exceptions will be made to allow for trucking
 companies and their schedules.
All items
MUST
be
 shipped with insurance. eBay does not offer this service anymore but
 because of the delicacy and value of most of our items, we must insure
 them when shipping. The insurance cost will be a flat $3.00 fee for
ALL
items sold within the
 US and a flat $5.00 fee for
ALL
items sold
 internationally.
Please email us for any international shipping quotes. We reserve the
 right to not ship certain items to a specific country for any reason.
 Large or particularly heavy items will
NOT
be shipped
internationally unless the purchaser agrees to the shipping charges and
 insurance fees before the end of the auction.
All international freight shipping must be arranged by the purchaser.
 We will prepare all freight items for shipment including but not
 limited to: palletizing, bubble wrap and crating (extra fee).

Ethicon HAR36 Harmonic Ace 36 Laparoscopic Shears
Individual Shaft Diameter:
5mm Length: 36CM
Here is what Ethicon has to say about Harmonic Ace Shears:
Precision, multifunctionality & minimal thermal tissue injury. This is design refined by experience. Input from hundreds of surgeons and continual refinements over the years have produced a surgical device with versatility and precision.
T
he HARMONIC ACE Curved Shears for both your laparoscopic and open procedures are:
Precise - minimal lateral thermal tissue damage for safer dissection near vital structures. Efficient - move through tissue quickly while maintaining haemostasis. Versatile - precisely cut, coagulate, grasp, and dissect - without instrument exchanges. Reliable - seal vessels up to 5mm as well as lymphatics.
Ergonomic - enjoy a comfortable grip, with handle and hook trigger for balance and control. Shaft Diameter: 5mm Length: 36CM
Compatible with HP054

SHIPPING:
We use USPS, FedEx or UPS for USA packages and FEDEX or USPS Express mail for international packages.
If the package you have received has been damaged during shipping and the box is damaged because of any mishandling, moisture, etc., you should keep the package and contact us so that we can file a claim with the carrier and request that they inspect the package. A refund will be available as soon as the carrier accepts to cover the damages. Refunds will not be made available if you fail to notify us of damage and the container is not available for inspection by the carrier. The claim process may take several weeks.
INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING:
International buyers - You are responsible for all customs and brokerage fees. If you want to insure your package for the full amount we will check on the costs for you although this could affect your customs cost. We pride ourselves on our packaging, however, if your package is damaged in transit we cannot be held liable if your package was not insured for the full amount.
International Buyers are responsible for all duties and taxes after it ships from our location. Duties and Taxes are not included in our shipping charges. A physical address is required for all buyers. Combined shipment is accepted if the items can be combined.

Description: 
Ethicon HAR36 Harmonic Ace 36 Laparoscopic Shears  - Individual
Overview
Ethicon HAR36 Harmonic Ace 36 Laparoscopic Shears
Individual  Shaft Diameter: 5mm  Length: 36CM
Here is what Ethicon has to say about Harmonic Ace Shears:
Precision, multifunctionality & minimal thermal tissue injury. This is design refined by experience.   Input from hundreds of surgeons and continual refinements over the years have produced a surgical device with versatility and precision.
The HARMONIC ACE Curved Shears for both your laparoscopic and open procedures are:
Precise - minimal lateral thermal tissue damage for safer dissection near vital structures.   Efficient - move through tissue quickly while maintaining haemostasis.   Versatile - precisely cut, coagulate, grasp, and dissect - without instrument exchanges.   Reliable - seal vessels up to 5mm as well as lymphatics.
Ergonomic - enjoy a comfortable grip, with handle and hook trigger for balance and control.   Shaft Diameter: 5mm   Length: 36CM
Compatible with HP054
Specialties   Urogoly   Colorectal   Bariatric   General Surgery

SHIPPING
Purchase more than one item from us and receive combined shipping!
As soon as you are done shopping with us please send us an invoice request so that we can combine your purchases and minimize your shipping charges. To combine shipping we look at all the items that you purchased and regardless of the individual shipping charges per item in the original listing, we combine the shipping cost toonly the amount that it costs us to actually ship your items to you!
All shipping charges include postage/shipping & handling fees and the cost of packing materials. Shipping charges do not include taxes, customs fees or duties including demurrage charges. All items are professionally packed to prevent damage. You will receive a messagewith tracking information regarding your shipment. Be aware that shipping charges listed are for within the continental U.S. only. All foreign shipments, (including Alaska and Hawaii), must receive an invoice with appropriate shipping charges before item(s) can be sent. If they are paid for before adjustments are made, the item(s) will be held until full shipment charges are paid.
DOMESTIC
You will be sent an invoice with the appropriate shipping amount(s) for both International and Domestic shipments. Invoice will also include adjusted shipping charges when shipping combined auctions.
All items shipped within the United States are NOTinsured unless otherwise requested. Buyer is responsible forany additional fees incurredfor insurance.
Your package(s) will ship within two (2) business days of payment received. All packagesare shipped via U.S. Priority Mail or UPS Ground,unless stated otherwise inthe auction listing.
INTERNATIONAL
For all international shipments, atelephone number is required.
International shipments are insured upon requests for an additional fee.
Yourpackage(s) willbe shipped out within five (5) business days of payment received.Please be aware that you may incur a brokerage and/or customs fee upon delivery. Winning bidder is responsible for shipping charges. We reserve the right to choose carrier based on shipping method selected at time of payment.Delivery timeof your package(s) may vary based on location and customs.

Restocking fees do not apply If the product is received damaged, broken or not as described. Please be sure to contact us before returning a product and for further details.

SHIPPING
Purchase more than one item from us and receive combined shipping!
As soon as you are done shopping with us please send us an invoice request so that we can combine your purchases and minimize your shipping charges. To combine shipping we look at all the items that you purchased and regardless of the individual shipping charges per item in the original listing, we combine the shipping cost toonly the amount that it costs us to actually ship your items to you!
All shipping charges include postage/shipping & handling fees and the cost of packing materials. Shipping charges do not include taxes, customs fees or duties including demurrage charges. All items are professionally packed to prevent damage. You will receive a messagewith tracking information regarding your shipment. Be aware that shipping charges listed are for within the continental U.S. only. All foreign shipments, (including Alaska and Hawaii), must receive an invoice with appropriate shipping charges before item(s) can be sent. If they are paid for before adjustments are made, the item(s) will be held until full shipment charges are paid.
DOMESTIC
You will be sent an invoice with the appropriate shipping amount(s) for both International and Domestic shipments. Invoice will also include adjusted shipping charges when shipping combined auctions.
All items shipped within the United States are NOTinsured unless otherwise requested. Buyer is responsible forany additional fees incurredfor insurance.
Your package(s) will ship within two (2) business days of payment received. All packagesare shipped via U.S. Priority Mail or UPS Ground,unless stated otherwise inthe auction listing.
INTERNATIONAL
For all international shipments, atelephone number is required.
International shipments are insured upon requests for an additional fee.
Yourpackage(s) willbe shipped out within five (5) business days of payment received.Please be aware that you may incur a brokerage and/or customs fee upon delivery. Winning bidder is responsible for shipping charges. We reserve the right to choose carrier based on shipping method selected at time of payment.Delivery timeof your package(s) may vary based on location and customs.
RETURNS
We offer a 14 day return policy as long as the product is unused and unopened for a 15% restocking fee and minus shipping costs. Restocking fees do not apply If the product is received damaged, broken or not as described. Please be sure to contact us before returning a product and for further details.
ABOUT US
Our goal is to provide excellent customer service as we supply you with medical and dental products along with a great assortment of name brand health and beauty products. Add us to your favorite seller list as our inventory of top name-brand products is always changing.

STATEMENT
We cannot and will not ship goods to the following Countries - Cuba, Iran, Iraq, Libya, North Korea, Sudan, UNITA (Angola), Afghanistan, Belarus, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Burma, Haiti, Indonesia, Kosovo, Liberia, Macedonia, Nigeria, Rwanda, Slovenia, Somalia, Syria, Vietnam, Yemen, Democratic Republic of the Congo (formerly Zaire), Zimbabwe.
POLICY
This equipment is offered with our as-represented guarantee. For U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states, this equipment is guaranteed to be as we represent it here in this auction description or your purchase price will be refunded upon return in as-shipped condition for a full refund of bid price. Please note that we record all serial numbers of each item that we ship. You must notify us of any discrepancies by email immediately upon receipt of equipment to make arrangements for return of equipment prior to any return. This guarantee applies to U.S. shipping addresses within the lower 48 states only (All sales or shipments to other locations will be as-is and are final).
DISCLAIMER
Regardless of the origin of the equipment, documentation provided or identification appearing upon the equipment, the equipment described and offered here is in no way certified for, recommended for, or offered for any specific use. The purchaser agrees that the seller shall not be held responsible or liable for any injuries or damages, whether incidental or consequential, associated in any way with the equipment. The purchaser, by bidding on this equipment, indicates their acknowledgment of, and agreement to the terms of this disclaimer.
EBAY RULES

If so, do not bid on this item unless you are an authorized purchaser. If the item is subject to FDA regulation, I will verify your status as an authorized purchaser of this item before shipping of the item." If you have questions about legal obligations regarding sales of medical devices, you should consult with the FDA's Center for Devices and Radiological Health:

Tools4Docs is an Exporters and Re-Seller of Medical Equipment located in Tampa, Florida and can be reached by calling (813) 699-4048.
