Condition: Pre-Owned, As-Is. (see below for condition terminology)
Condition Terminology
PRE-OWNED, AS-IS
:
Equipment is being sold AS IS. No warranty expressed or implied. No guarantee of functionality.
PRE
-OWNED, AS-IS POWERS ON
: Equipment
is being sold AS IS Powers On. No warranty expressed or implied other than the equipment is guaranteed to power on. The equipment has not been calibrated or tested for proper functionality.
PRE-OWNED, PATIENT-READY:
Equipment is being sold as having been tested, calibrated, and bio-medically certified. No cosmetic work done to the unit. No warranty unless noted in the above description.
Will include copy of Biomedical Report.
PRE-OWNED, RECONDITIONED, PATIENT-READY
:
Equipment is being sold as having been tested, calibrated, and bio-medically certified. Cosmetic work has been done to the unit. No warranty unless noted in the above description.
Will include copy of Biomedical Report.
PRE-OWNED, UNUSED
:
Equipment was never used or put into service. Equipment will be in like new condition.
The item has been cleaned and handled in accordance with the manufacturer's instructions. It is the responsibility of the buyer to ensure that all equipment is thoroughly inspected and calibrated by qualified technicians before placing into patient use.
Policies/Tax Information
KMA Remarketing must collect sales tax in the following states: CT, PA, OH, NY, NJ, IL, IN, KS, MI, NC, and KY. Please note: If you live in Ohio, New York, or Kansas, these states calculate sales tax either by county, municipality, or city. The seller must calculate your sales tax before the transaction can be finalized. Additionally, both Pittsburgh, PA, and Philadelphia, PA, have up to 8% sales tax depending on exact delivery zip code. If you have any questions, please contact me anytime. I will be glad to assist you.
Domestic Shipping
We use a flat rate for all UPS Ground shipments less then 50 pounds. This excludes Alaska, Hawaii, and the Dominican Republic. These locations must contact KMA Remarketing for a valid shipping quote. There is a $15.00 per box handling fee added to all ground shipments. This also includes items being shipped on a customer's account.
Domestic Freight
All items over 50 pounds, irregularly shaped or over sized must be shipped via a freight carrier. There is a $50.00 handling fee that will be applied to all freight shipments. Please be sure to supply us with the following information for all freight shipping:
Is the item going to a business or a residence?
Does this location have a loading dock?
Will you need inside delivery?
Will you need notification of the shipment?
After this information is collected, we will then get quotes from (3) three different carriers and pass on the best-priced quote to you. Please do not wait until the last minute to request a quote. It does take time for the carriers to get back to us with shipping quotes.
International Buyers
We do ship worldwide. For smaller items, we will ship via USPS Express Mail International. The buyer is responsible for all tariffs, taxes, duties, etc., that are necessary for proper entry into your country. USPS requires that we have a phone number for all packages. Please be sure to supply your phone number to us at the time of purchase. We cannot ship your item without your phone number. Your order will be put on hold until all of the proper information is gathered for the shipping documents. We will also ship freight items worldwide; we only ship from door to port. When requesting a shipping quote, please supply us with the port where you would like to pick up your item. Please do not wait unit the last minute to request a shipping quote; it does take a few days to get a response from carriers on these quotes.
PLEASE DO NOT BID ON THIS ITEM UNTIL YOU HAVE A VALID SHIPPING QUOTE FROM KMA REMARKETING.

SHIPPING
Purchase more than one item from us and receive combined shipping!
As soon as you are done shopping with us please send us an invoice request so that we can combine your purchases and minimize your shipping charges. To combine shipping we look at all the items that you purchased and regardless of the individual shipping charges per item in the original listing, we combine the shipping cost toonly the amount that it costs us to actually ship your items to you!
All shipping charges include postage/shipping & handling fees and the cost of packing materials. Shipping charges do not include taxes, customs fees or duties including demurrage charges. All items are professionally packed to prevent damage. You will receive a messagewith tracking information regarding your shipment. Be aware that shipping charges listed are for within the continental U.S. only. All foreign shipments, (including Alaska and Hawaii), must receive an invoice with appropriate shipping charges before item(s) can be sent. If they are paid for before adjustments are made, the item(s) will be held until full shipment charges are paid.
DOMESTIC
You will be sent an invoice with the appropriate shipping amount(s) for both International and Domestic shipments. Invoice will also include adjusted shipping charges when shipping combined auctions.
All items shipped within the United States are NOTinsured unless otherwise requested. Buyer is responsible forany additional fees incurredfor insurance.
Your package(s) will ship within two (2) business days of payment received. All packagesare shipped via U.S. Priority Mail or UPS Ground,unless stated otherwise inthe auction listing.
INTERNATIONAL
For all international shipments, atelephone number is required.
International shipments are insured upon requests for an additional fee.
Yourpackage(s) willbe shipped out within five (5) business days of payment received.Please be aware that you may incur a brokerage and/or customs fee upon delivery. Winning bidder is responsible for shipping charges. We reserve the right to choose carrier based on shipping method selected at time of payment.Delivery timeof your package(s) may vary based on location and customs.
RETURNS

Restocking fees do not apply If the product is received damaged, broken or not as described. Please be sure to contact us before returning a product and for further details.

POLICIES
SHIPPING
I
take great care and time packing each item to make sure it gets to you in the
exact same condition it leaves here.I photograph and document all serial
numbers and Warranty/Security stickers to avoid any confusion or scams.
As
soon as the auction is over and the item has sold, I will immediately pack your
item for shipment. Once your order has been processed and the payment is
received, Ill ship out your item WITHIN 2 BUSINESS DAYS. Tracking
information will be updated as it is made available. Please submit any
packing or shipping requests at time of payment.
To
help keep us both safe and secure, I only ship to a confirmed PayPal
address. If you need me to ship to an unconfirmed address, please contact
me and well do all we can to find the best possible option for you.
INTERNATIONAL BUYERS need to contact me before bidding so we can discuss all of
the costs associated with your shipment. Ill give you a ROCK SOLID QUOTE
on shipping so youll know exactly what to expect.

PAYMENT
Pay Pal is preferred; Please feel free to ask any questions prior to closing as all sales are final.
Payment must be received within 7 days of the close of auction.
If payment isn't received within 7 days, the auction will be revoked and a Non-Paying Bidder alert will be filed.
SHIPPING
Purchase more than one item from us and receive combined shipping!
As soon as you are done shopping with us please send us an invoice request so that we can combine your purchases and minimize your shipping charges. To combine shipping we look at all the items that you purchased and regardless of the individual shipping charges per item in the original listing, we combine the shipping cost toonly the amount that it costs us to actually ship your items to you!
All shipping charges include postage/shipping & handling fees and the cost of packing materials. Shipping charges do not include taxes, customs fees or duties including demurrage charges. All items are professionally packed to prevent damage. You will receive a messagewith tracking information regarding your shipment. Be aware that shipping charges listed are for within the continental U.S. only. All foreign shipments, (including Alaska and Hawaii), must receive an invoice with appropriate shipping charges before item(s) can be sent. If they are paid for before adjustments are made, the item(s) will be held until full shipment charges are paid.
DOMESTIC
You will be sent an invoice with the appropriate shipping amount(s) for both International and Domestic shipments. Invoice will also include adjusted shipping charges when shipping combined auctions.
All items shipped within the United States are NOTinsured unless otherwise requested. Buyer is responsible forany additional fees incurredfor insurance.
Your package(s) will ship within two (2) business days of payment received. All packagesare shipped via U.S. Priority Mail or UPS Ground,unless stated otherwise inthe auction listing.
INTERNATIONAL
For all international shipments, atelephone number is required.
International shipments are insured upon requests for an additional fee.
Yourpackage(s) willbe shipped out within five (5) business days of payment received.Please be aware that you may incur a brokerage and/or customs fee upon delivery. Winning bidder is responsible for shipping charges. We reserve the right to choose carrier based on shipping method selected at time of payment.Delivery timeof your package(s) may vary based on location and customs.
RETURNS
We offer a 14 day return policy as long as the product is unused and unopened for a 15% restocking fee and minus shipping costs. Restocking fees do not apply If the product is received damaged, broken or not as described. Please be sure to contact us before returning a product and for further details.

To the best ofour knowledge any one can buy this item .In order to comply with the e-bay medical device listing policy sellermust also include following
The item is used and the original box that the item came with has been opened.
The item is in its original condition and no alterations have been made to the item.
The item has been properly cleaned and handled, following the manufacturers recommendations.
The item comes with the accessories specifically mentioned in the description or shown in the pictures.
This item is not a food or medical product that has expired.
This item does not appear to be damaged or mishandled.
This item is not a prescription drug or a prescription device.
To the best of seller's knowledge, the item has not been recalled.
This item will be shipped in the original box with all directions and manuals that came with the product from the manufacturer. The item was sold to a medical care facility and the box is plane. Since the item is an institutional purchase it may not contain the same documentation and/or packing that you would see with a retail product. Because it was assumed that medical, professionals are proficient at the use of this product.

Description: 
Proximate ILS Curved Intraluminal Stapler Ethicon Endo-surgery. CDH21. Expired 2008-07
Tissue thickness varies  even within a single patient's GI tract. 
That's why our circular staplers enable you to adjust staple height to 
accommodate tissue that's between 1.0mm and 2.5mm thick. Our new 
intraluminal stapler has a Tissue Compression Indicator, which measures 
compressed tissue thickness at specific positions within a gap setting 
scale.
When applied to tissue, these staplers provide the necessary 
compression to create the anastomosis. During firing, the controlled 
tissue compression and adjustable-height staples allow for uniform 
staple formation at the specific staple height. Afterwards, the formed 
staples continue to deliver the proper compression to provide a 
leak-free anastomosis and good hemostasis to facilitate healing.

Description: 
Ethicon Endo-surgery - endopouch retriever 10 mm
Ethicon Endo-surgery - endopouch retriever 10 mm Ref Pouch.
Expires 2014-03
This sale is for one pouch.

The ENDOPOUCH Specimen Retrieval Bag System utilizes two support arms to facilitate bag opening and tissue capture during laparoscopic procedures. Both the bag and support arms are attached to the shaft and introducer so the retriever may easily be used to extract specimens.

The ENDOPOUCH Specimen Retrieval Bag includes a flexible plastic bag with a large, easily-accessible opening, a push/pull rod with thumb-ring handle, finger rings, and an introducer tube.

The thumb-ring handle and finger rings enable one-handed deployment of the specimen bag within the body cavity. In the fully deployed condition, the bag opening is maintained in a fully-open position by a metallic rim. A string with a slip knot enables you to close the bag after you have collected the specimen.
Features include:

    One-handed, syringe motion deployment
    10mm diameter shaft
    224ml bag volume
    4 in. x 6 in. bag size

Procedure applications:

    Gynecology
    General surgery

SHIPPING:
We use USPS, FedEx or UPS for USA packages and FEDEX or USPS Express mail for international packages.
If the package you have received has been damaged during shipping and the box is damaged because of any mishandling, moisture, etc., you should keep the package and contact us so that we can file a claim with the carrier and request that they inspect the package. A refund will be available as soon as the carrier accepts to cover the damages. Refunds will not be made available if you fail to notify us of damage and the container is not available for inspection by the carrier. The claim process may take several weeks.
INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING:
International buyers - You are responsible for all customs and brokerage fees. If you want to insure your package for the full amount we will check on the costs for you although this could affect your customs cost. We pride ourselves on our packaging, however, if your package is damaged in transit we cannot be held liable if your package was not insured for the full amount.

PAYMENT

Payment must be received within 7 days of the close of auction.

SHIPPING
Purchase more than one item from us and receive combined shipping!
As soon as you are done shopping with us please send us an invoice request so that we can combine your purchases and minimize your shipping charges. To combine shipping we look at all the items that you purchased and regardless of the individual shipping charges per item in the original listing, we combine the shipping cost toonly the amount that it costs us to actually ship your items to you!
All shipping charges include postage/shipping & handling fees and the cost of packing materials. Shipping charges do not include taxes, customs fees or duties including demurrage charges. All items are professionally packed to prevent damage. You will receive a messagewith tracking information regarding your shipment. Be aware that shipping charges listed are for within the continental U.S. only. All foreign shipments, (including Alaska and Hawaii), must receive an invoice with appropriate shipping charges before item(s) can be sent. If they are paid for before adjustments are made, the item(s) will be held until full shipment charges are paid.
DOMESTIC
You will be sent an invoice with the appropriate shipping amount(s) for both International and Domestic shipments. Invoice will also include adjusted shipping charges when shipping combined auctions.
All items shipped within the United States are NOTinsured unless otherwise requested. Buyer is responsible forany additional fees incurredfor insurance.
Your package(s) will ship within two (2) business days of payment received. All packagesare shipped via U.S. Priority Mail or UPS Ground,unless stated otherwise inthe auction listing.
INTERNATIONAL
For all international shipments, atelephone number is required.
International shipments are insured upon requests for an additional fee.
Yourpackage(s) willbe shipped out within five (5) business days of payment received.Please be aware that you may incur a brokerage and/or customs fee upon delivery. Winning bidder is responsible for shipping charges. We reserve the right to choose carrier based on shipping method selected at time of payment.Delivery timeof your package(s) may vary based on location and customs.
RETURNS
We offer a 14 day return policy as long as the product is unused and unopened for a 15% restocking fee and minus shipping costs. Restocking fees do not apply If the product is received damaged, broken or not as described. Please be sure to contact us before returning a product and for further details.

Testing/Functional Notes
This item successfully powers on. The displays light up and buttons are responsive to input. Unless otherwise noted. Some units come with batteries; however, we will not guarantee the life. This listing is for used item in acceptable cosmetic condition with scuffs and scratches associated with normal use. It is the winning bidders responsibility to have the item evaluated by a Biomed prior to patient use.
Payment Terms: PayPal only. All items in auction must be paid in 4 days.If not paid in 4 days a Unpaid
Refunds
Refunds will be issued via check within 7 business days after the receipt of the equipment. All return items must be in original condition, packaging, sealed and unused, tamper tag must be intact. We reserve the right to reject the item after inspection, (items with physical damage or incomplete packaging, incomplete items). In the event that physical damage is caused during transit of a return, it is the customers responsibility to contact the carrier to start a damage claim upon receiving a notification from us. The responsibility is between the customer and the carrier.No refunds will be given when states in listing.
Shipping Terms
Items ship within 1 to 3 business days after payment is received. Orders will be shipped the most cost effective means. All items are packaged and shipped in a professional manner. The tracking number will be sent to you. Combined shipping discounts are available for multiple item purchases. Flat rate fees are for Continental US shipping ONLY. Alaska, Hawaii and all other NON Contiguous Territories are extra cost.
FDA Regulation and Certification
The sale of this item may be subject to strict regulations by the U.S. Food and Drug Administration and state and local regulatory agencies. If so, do not bid on this item unless you are an authorized purchaser. If the item is subject to FDA regulation, we will verify your status as an authorized purchaser of this item before shipping of the item.
We will ship International; however, Customers/Buyers are responsible for any customs duties, taxes, tariffs or any other charges as such on items being shipped to a foreign country. If item is shipped to a U.S. exporter, once it is received by the exporter we are no longer responsible for the item.
All freight items are shipped within the continental U.S only. All international freight purchases are shipped to a U.S. exporter only. Once it is signed for by the U.S. Exporter we are no longer responsible for the item.

Most orders shipping to IA, IN, IL, MI, or WI will arrive the next day.
We will combine shipping
for multiple purchases.
If purchasing multiple listings, please wait to pay until we send a combined invoice.
There will be a 7.75% sales tax added for items shipped within the state of Illinois.
We accept PayPal - or you may call us and pay via credit card at 888-416-2409.
We offer a
30 day money-back guarantee
on every item we sell.
If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact us. You can send a message via eBay or call us at 888-416-2409.
